item.text: rdo rje sems dpa' nam mkha' che/ kun tu bzang po gsang ba'i snying po'i rgyud bzhugs so// rgya gar skad du/ badzra sa twa kha sa ma hA sa man+ta b+ha dra gu h+ya gar+d+ha tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ rdo rje sems dpa' nam mkha' che/ kun tu bzang po gsang ba'i snying po'i rgyud/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i bdag nyid/ sangs rgyas ma lus pa med pa thams cad la dbyer med pa/ skyid pa'i 'byung gnas rdzogs par longs spyod pa'i rin po che thugs rje chen po de thugs rje chen po'o// bde bar gshegs pa'i thugs chen po// mi gnas sna tshogs lam mchog

gi/ 'og min[(]tsha khyad par gyur[)]pa yi// mtha' dang dbus med phyogs rgya chad// gru bzhi blo 'bur sgo bzhi ldan// bsam gyis mi khyab phyi nang rgyan// dbus na seng ge pad+ma ldan// rin chen 'bar ba'i stegs bu la// don dam snying po bla med 'khyil// 'khor lo 'od 'bar rtsibs bzhi ni/ khyad par gyur pa rdzogs pa'i mchog/ de bzhin ting 'dzin ting nge 'dzin// dkyil 'khor 'bar ba ji bzhin du// gsum gnyis dkyil 'khor bla na med// thugs rje chen po 'od 'bar phyir// so mang spu gri gzhal yas gsal// smin pa thugs 'dzin de nyid tshe// ngas byed gtsug gi nor bu 'bar// byang chub bar snang la sogs la// bcom ldan 'das kyi ljags rtse yis// gsang ba 'di ni rab tu bsgrags// 'di ni gsang chen rab nges pa'i// chub par gnas pas bcom ldan 'das// 'gro ba kun la rang bzhin gnas// phyin ci log tu rnam brtags kyang// grol ba rang byung gzhan la min// btsal du med pa'i snying po 'di// med pa ma yin rdo rje'i snying po can// yod pa ma yin med pa'i snying po yod// 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal byang chub sems// kun tu chub pas rnam par rol// de la bskyod pa med bzhin du// nam mkha'i mtha' ltar mnyam par gnas// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje snying pos/ ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// gling bral 'di la gang gnas pa// rdo rje snying po sra ba'i mchog/ rdo rje ye shes dkyil 'khor ldan// bdag dang gzhan don mi 'byed pas// sgyu ma lhun grub yul la rol// chos sku kun tu khyab pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam gyur pa'i// gang yang dbyer med dkyil 'khor 'di// rnam pa kun ldan mchog gi sku// bde ba chen po'i rgyud las gsang ba'i man ngag/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas yang bcom lda 'das ye nas grol ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas// ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// gdod nas rnam par grol ba'i lam// bden pa nyid kyi dkyil 'khor la// mthong thos reg dang dran pa yis// sdig pa kun las rnam par grol// sangs rgyas dngos grub snying po

'di// lhag ma med pas yongs su rdzogs// 'gyur ba ma yin drang por gnas// sla zhing dka' la sla phyir dka'// mngon du mi gnas kun tu khyab// mngon sum 'di zhes bstan par ni// rdo rje sems dpa' mtshon du med// lhun gyis gnas pa'i bde chen te// cha lugs 'bar byed la sogs pas// dpag cing mtshon du med pa'i phyir// rgya 'di bsgrubs pa tsam gyis ni// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor mthong mi 'gyur// ji snyed rnam grangs ma lus pa// 'ching ba'i rgyu ste byang chub sgrib// byang chub nyid las byang chub med// de bas sangs rgyas chos kyang med// dge dang sdig pa rnam grol zhing// spyod dang blta dang 'jug sogs med// tshig gis tha snyad med pa'i phyir// dbyibs dang ye shes don las 'das// rang byung ye shes btsal med pas// snang 'dod sbyor ba las byung ba'i// rtsol sems bde ba bla med kyang// de ni de sgrib skyon chen yin// da lta'i bde dang phyi ma'i bde// mngon sum pa dang rgyab las byung// de yang rnam pa'i skyon yin pas// de ni brten par mi bya'o// e ma ho shin tu ngo mtshar che// tshig gis mtshon du med pa las// sangs rgyas 'du ba ngo mtshar che/ theg pa mkha' 'dra lta ba'i klong// dur khrod brdal ba snying po mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' bder gnas pas// rnam rtog dus la ltos su med// bgrod cing sbyong ba'i lam dang bral// yin pa'i don nyid gzhig tu med// lta ba zhes sam snying po'ang med// nam mkha'i ming yang thob pa med// de ltar de bzhin de yi phyir// de la de bstan de yang thob// de ni snying po de bas na// de las de 'byung ngo mtshar che// sngon gyi de dang da ltar de// de bzhin de yi gnas su che// de ltar de yi lam 'dra bar// de ni de yi rang bzhin no// de dang 'dra ba yongs kyi lam// zla ba las byung rten dang bcas// kun gyi mnyam nyid yin pa las// phyogs su bltas pas grub pa med// 'di ni smon pa'i yul las 'das// bya bral lhun grub mchog gi sku// tha snyad mi 'byed gcig gi ngang// 'khrul pas tha snyad bgrangs rtsol ba// dmus long lag tu rdzas bskur ba// gang du ma grub ma gsal na// ci yang ma grub de bzhin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das shin tu zab pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// kun 'dus kun klong kun gyi yid bzhin no// rdo rje 'dus pas bde ba chen po'i sku// mnyam snyoms 'dus ma byas pa mnyam dbyings chen po'i mchog/ mi dmigs mi skye mi 'gag snang ba med// mchog gi snying po dam pa yin te spros dang bral// sangs rgyas gzhan nas thob re ye nas med do de bzhin nyid// de bzhin nyid kyang dbu mar mi dmigs bden pa gnyis mi mnga'// bden gnyis ldan

pas sa brgyad pa la'ang yod pa min// de yod mtshan ma med par lhun gyis grub pa bya ba med// bgrang ba'i tha snyad dam pa rnams la yod pa ye nas min// de phyir theg pa'i snying po nyid la tha snyad ga la yod// tha snyad med par 'jug lta bsrung sgo 'bras bu 'dod pa gol// gang yang dam pa'i snying po 'di la theg pa bgrang ba med// rtsol bgrang theg par 'dod pa rtog pa'i blo// 'bras bu sangs rgyas thob par 'dod pa 'khrul pa'i lam// sa bcu mthar phyin sa nyid 'dzin dang rtog/ 'dzin rtog de la lam gyi phugs mi gnas// lam med lam du 'dod pa 'gro sa 'khrul// thob med 'bras bu 'dod pas don mi mthong// ye shes dbyings su 'dod pas dbyings mi rnyed// phyag rgya skur ru bsgoms pas don mi mthong// rgya mtsho skyogs kyis bcus nas zad mi srid// snang srid phyag rgyar bsgoms pas sangs mi rgya// 'dod pa'i yon tan spangs pas byang mi chub// nyon mongs las spangs mya ngan 'das mi rnyed// 'phur skyes bye phrug sgong chag 'phur ba ltar// tshad mas mi shes dpes kyang rnyed pa min// mi 'byed bden pa gnyis med yi ge med pa yi// lung la mi ltos theg pa mi rtsol ba'i// ye rgyal ye yin rtsal med rgyal po 'di// thos ma thag tu ye sangs rgyas pa yin// nye lam snyed med rtsol bral nad sel ba'i// sman gyi rgyal po bla med mchog gi sku// 'di ma mthong bar gang yang mi mthong zhing// bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas mthong ba ni// rmi lam ma mthong mthong med sad pa'i yul phyogs na// ci yang ma mthong rdul med phyogs blta 'dra// 'di zhes bstan par dka' ba 'di mthong rnyed pa ni// rgya mtshor lug mig lu ma'i chu gang blugs bzhin rgya mtsho nyid// ye shes yul du 'dod 'khrul dpe med mthong ba 'khrul// 'di la su dpog shes rab chung zhing gti mug shes rab lhag mthong ba// kun tu 'od sa bsgrub rung yun tu bsgrub na mthong ba sprin srid// gang yang mi 'gag de med de mi 'byung bar kun 'byung snying po 'di// su sbyong su 'dod su bsgoms su bsnyen de la de mi gnas// rgyal po phru gu ye nas rgyal bzhin 'di yang gnas// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i sangs rgyas kyis kyang btsal bas 'di mi rnyed// ngang gis mi g.yo mi bskyaud de bzhin ye nas rang bzhin gnas// gang gis blta bas mthong ba de la blta ba med// don 'di tshad mas shes pas brda' mi 'phrad/ khyung phrug seng ge'i bu ni mngal nas gnyen po bzhin// mi 'gyur yangs pa'i klong 'di gnyen po yin// theg pa kun las rtsal sbyangs 'bras bu'i lam 'dod kyang// ye nas sgron ma yangs pa'i snying po 'di ma mthong na ni// rgya mtsho'i chu klung mthong yang skom grir shi ba bzhin// snying po 'di ni chu zla me long yin te ma bstan

gsal// ji ltar snang yang de la g.yos pa med par gnas// dper na rgyal mtshan mthon po rgyal rtags yin bzhin du// theg mchog 'di ni theg pa'i snying po yin// dper na myu gu med par sdong byung yod med bzhin// ye nas med pa mi skye mi 'byung bde ba'i klong// chos 'di ma mthong bar ni sangs rgyas yod mi 'byung// dper na myu gu sde'u nyid 'bras bu'i rang bzhin ltar// mi skye mi rtsol bsgrub med snying po 'di nyid ni// rgyal ba rnams kyi myu gu nyid de sangs rgyas 'bras// bya med klong las nyams pa med pa cho ga'i mchog/ gang yang mi rtsol de bzhin gnas pa bsgom pa'i klong// yang dag lam 'di bla med lam mchog mthar lam nyid kyi sku// rgyal ba nyid de phyis 'byung snying po yongs kyis min// bzlas pa mi dgos skur bskyed pa ni byis pa'i lam// gang yang sngon du ston pa min te mthar phyin med/ ye nas phyag rgya snying po mchog 'di rgyu ste 'bras bu yin// mdo sde 'dul ba mngon pa kun rdzogs ye shes rgyan// bsod nams ye shes tshogs rdzogs dri med yangs pa'i klong// drang srong bsgom 'dod pa yis 'di mi mthong// 'di mthong mnyam pa'i don la zhugs srid pa na de las med// rab tu mthong ba dka' phyir chu bran rgya mtsho tshol ba bzhin// gcig gi snying po 'di la rtog ges theg par phyed// theg par phye ba 'di nyid yin te 'di med par ni lam mi rnyed// lam rnyed pa na'ang 'khrul pa'i lam rings glang po rdzab chud 'dra// lo ma thog gu yal 'dab 'byung ba nyid ni rtsa ba'i skyabs// de med par ni de 'byung mi srid phyir// chos kyi snying po 'di ni mchog gi rtsa ba yin pas so// sku gcig shin tu bsgoms pas 'di las nyams// gnyis bsgoms pas ni rtog mtha' mang ste rnam grangs pa// 'di 'dod mangs pa rnam pa dag la rten pa de la byang chub med// lam rings lam la des bgrod pas ni mtho ris lam mi rnyaid de gol// de yis sangs rgyas mthong mi srid de byang chub gting nas med// 'di 'dod pa la 'di mi gnas te rtog pa'i klong// rtog pa can la don mi snang ste sdug bsngal che// 'khrul 'khor snyoms 'jug ye nas med de blang dor med// byang chub rgyab kyis phyogs pas 'di rnyed 'di mi snang// byang chub 'dod pa de la ye nas 'di mi gnang// sa bgrang byis pa'i spyod yul sa yi mchog mi rnyed// gnyis 'dzin pa la yangs pa'i snying po med de rtog pa'i rgyun// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi don gyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ ched du brjod de/ stong gsum 'jig rten ye nas bsgral mi dgos// ye mnyam ye sangs rgyas pas bsgral du gdod nas dag/ mchog gi snying po phyag rgya chen po'i sku// sems ni rdo rje nyid de cis kyang gzhig tu med// byang chub sems nyid rin

po che ste gang yang 'byung// nam mkha' gser te sa gzhi rgya mtsho yin// zla gsal lta bur rnam par grol ba'i sku// thams cad bskyed pa'i mkha' ste dpag bsam shing// ma lus lus pa med pa mchog gi yul// ye khyab ye sangs rgyas pa sgo phugs med// 'jug lta srung spyod 'bras bu thob par yongs mi 'dod// 'dod pa de nyid rdzogs pa chen po 'di[(]'i[)(]tsha yi[)]sgrib chen yin// sbyang gzhi btsal bas rnyed pa'i yul med de// ye nas sbyang mi dgos pas khams gsum ye sangs rgyas// tshig gi spyod yul dbang po phobs mi rung// bsgom zhes 'di la gdams su med pa yin// bsgom du dngos po med de tshig tsam mtshon du med// dbyings med ye shes gsog ste ngag gi smra ba sgrib// ci yang med pa ma yin med pa'i snying po yod// ci yang dmigs yin dmigs pa'i snying po yod// mi blta mi spyod mi bsrung mi bsgom pa[(]tsha nyid[)]snying po yin// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das snying po med pa las ji ltar rdzogs zhes zhus pas/ bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos thams cad lhun gyis rdzogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// kun 'byung rang rig byang chub sems nyid 'di// gzhan nas ma btsal gang na ye nas med// brjod pa'i tha snyad med pas byang chub ste// nam mkha' nor bu 'di la kun rdzogs te// spyir yang snang phyir dkyil 'khor ji ltar snang yang 'di la rdzogs// gzugs med snying po chu zla lta bu ni// gzugs sku ji ltar snang yang 'di la rdzogs// yod pa'i snying po yin te sangs rgyas ma lus yin// med pa'i snying po yin te gzhi dang rtsa ba med// don gyi snying po 'di la sus kyang mtshon du med// sangs rgyas rnams kyi nyid kyi sku la rdzogs// 'byung ba thams cad nam mkha'i dbyings su rdzogs// chos rnams thams cad thig le'i klong 'dir rdzogs// sangs rgyas thams cad nyid kyi thugs la rdzogs// lta ba khyung chen mya ngan 'das pa yi// mchog gi snying po 'di la ma lus rdzogs// de phyir rdzogs pa chen po zhes bya ste// 'di las yon tan 'byung ba'i gzugs brnyan ni// sgrib pa gol sa nyid de snying por longs ma gsungs// kun rdzogs 'di ma mthong bar rgyal ba 'byung mi srid// de nas bcom ldan 'das la rdo rje 'dzin pas/ rdzogs pa'i snying po 'di bsam par bya ba ci mchis zhes gsol pas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs rje chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// mi bsam mi g.yeng mi bsgom mi dmigs par// de bzhin snying po 'di la dmigs su yod min pas// 'dzin pas mi bzung de bzhin rang bzhin bzhag/ bsam pa rtog pa

yin phyir ci yang bsam mi khyab// grub pa'i mtha' mi spyod pa bsam pa'i mchog/ yul dang dbang por mi 'byed lhug par bzhag/ dbang po yul la yan pa brtul mi bya// yul la ma gzhig ye nas de bzhin nyid// ji bzhin yul la de bzhin mi 'byed pa nyid mchog/ kun bzang yangs pa'i mkha' der thams cad lam gyis rdzogs/ khu byug dus bsrung nam zla dgos bsgrub ltar// gzhan gyis ji ltar rang rgyud sbyangs te gzhung bsnyegs kyang// dgos don rdzogs chen ma grub bar du byang chub med// de phyir rnal 'byor don la 'jug pa rnams kyis kyang// 'di la mi bsgom mi btsal rang sar de bzhin bzhag/ phyag rgya sku ru bsgom pa gol sa yin// rgyu 'bras gnyis su 'byed pa 'khrul pa'i lam// bden pa gnyis med de bas ming yang med// dge sdig gnyis med sdig pa byas pa mchog/ sbyor ba'i yul med snang srid ye sangs rgyas// gang yang mi skye mi 'gag cir yang dgongs su med// rgyal ba'i yul du gyur pas de bzhin nyid// ces kyang bsgo ba med pas nam mkha'i klong// de bzhin gyi nar ma bcos de nyid rang bzhin bzhag/ bde ba chen po'i rgyud las/ gsang ba'i man ngag gi snying po rdzogs pa chen po nyid bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pas bcom ldan 'das lta ba zhes bya ba ji ltar lags/ zhes gsol pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dmigs su med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// lta ba'i klong nyid 'di la sus kyang dpyad du med// stong pa'i bsam gtan pa nyid lta bas nyams// ye shes spyi blugs pa la lta mi mnga'// rnam rtog bdud yin rdo rje 'chang ba nyid/ khyung chen mkha' rlabs gcod ltar khyad par che// mi ldog ye shes mchog sa 'di yang dag/ ye shes phugs 'di kun gyi 'gro khung ste// mi gnas gnas med mi rtog yangs pa'i lam// gang la mi brten gang la 'di gnas ma yin// rdo rje 'dzin pa chen pos mchog tu dges pa'i mnyam nyid ces bya ba ji ltar lags zhes gsol pas/ bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// kun gyi gsang mchog dgyes pas na// sku yi sku nyid rtag tu bzhugs// de ni rang byung bcom ldan 'das// gcig tu rab tu che ba'i sku// thams cad ma lus mchog gi bla// kun sbyor mnyam nyid dag pa ste// ngo bo nyid kyi mthur ldan pas// chags med chags dang bral ba'ang min// sangs rgyas ma lus mnyam sbyor phyir// dbu mar yang ni mi dmigs so// kun rdzob gnyis med thaig pa'i mchog/ sangs rgyas kun gyi bde chen yin// sangs rgyas kun gy-i bdag po nyid// rtag pa nyid du rnam par

bzhugs// byang chub spyod pa sna tshogs mchog/ bzhugs bsam bdud las rgyal la sogs// kun tu sku dang theg kun dang// mi bskyod la sogs te rtsibs gnas// rin chen ral gri pad+ma dang// rdo rje gan d+he 'khor lo ste// ut+pal spos tog mar me dri// srog shing me long la sogs la// ngo mtshar sgyu 'phrul phyag rgya ni// 'khor lo las ni sna tshogs 'byung// de nyid 'dod chags 'dod chags bral// 'jig rten gsum dang khams gsum dang// dus gsum srid gsum mchog gsum dang// rnam par grol dang ma grol dang// mnyam dang mi mnyam la sogs pa// 'khor lo'i tshul du rnam par bskor// rnam pa sna tshogs tha dad pa'i// dkyil 'khor ma lus bsam yas dang// 'gro ba dag ni ma lus kun// chos kyi dbyings dang mi mnyam pa'i// dam pa rgya mchog ma lus phyir// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// byang chub sems nyid rdo rje ste// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid yin// dbang po mchog gi dkyil 'khor du// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor kun rdzogs pas// rdo rje sems dpa' nam mkha' che// kun bzang yangs pa chos kyi dbyings// rnam dag lam chen kun sgrol phyir// mi skye mi 'gag cir mi dgongs// bde ba chen po'i rgyud las gsang ba'i man ngag gi snying po'i dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pas gsol// bcom ldan dpa' bo thabs chen pos// sna tshogs lha ni sbyor bar mdzod// ces gsol pas/ kun tu bzang pos thams cad sna tshogs par sbyar ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ 'di skad brjod do// rtog pa'i mchog rnams thams cad la// sna tshogs la skye sbyor byed pa// rang gi mthu yis rig pa snang// gzhan nas sna tshogs chos yod min// sems can rtog mtha' bsam yas pas// yang dag sangs rgyas cir yang 'phrul// nam mkha' gzhan tshul nyid du snang// 'dzin pas bzung byas kun yin te// rgyal sras gsung min logs su 'grub// ma 'dres gzhan gyi srog las gol// rdul nyid don gyi mar 'dod cing// rdul bsags gang bur gnas phyir yang// bsags rdul mi rung don med 'gyur// rten 'brel sgyu ma la sogs nyid// gnyis kyi thabs med shes rab bral// sna tshogs lha yi mchog nyid ni// srid gsum ngo bor kun bsdus te// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// mgon po sgrib med dag pa yi// rtsol bral dkyil 'khor lhun gyis grub// bstan 'byung dkyil 'khor rtag pa nyid// yang dag yon tan rgya chen te// sku gnyis blta bas mi ngoms shing// bltas pas mthong bar mi rung phyir// che bas che ba'i zab mo yin// rang

byung ye shes btsal med pas// grol nas grol ba'i lam yang ston// bde ba chen po'i rgyud las/ gsang ba man ngag gi snying po nyid// mu stegs dang nyan thos las lam ring bar bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// gsang ba'i thig le gnyis min pas// ye shes yang dag sa yi 'od// bcom ldan 'das nyid lha yi lha// dpa' bo che la phyag 'tshal lo// sems can spros med ma skyes pa// skye mi skye yi gros spangs pa'i// 'byung dang 'byung gyur rab sbyor ba// mchog tu rtag par sbyor ba'o// rin chen thams cad 'byung gnas dag/ 'od 'byung nam mkha' 'dra ba yi// rgyal mtshan 'bar ba btsugs pa ste// 'od ldan nyi mas dbang bskur ba'o// chos kyi longs spyod dag pa 'byung/ kha 'byed pad+ma dmar po'i mchog/ 'dod chags de nyid gsang ba'i mchog/ thams cad gsal byed bdud rtsi'i sku// kun bsgyur dbang phyug yang dag ldan// de bzhin gshegs tshul khu tshur bstan// sna tshogs ye shes sna tshogs che// dge ba'i las chen khyad par snang// kun 'byung thig le mchog nyid 'dzin// ma byung mi skye'i snying po la// sgro btags chos kun ga la yod// ye nas byar med bya las 'das// rig dang ye shes tha snyad pas// 'byung ba chen po bcom ldan 'das// bde ba chen po'i rgyud las/ gsang ba'i man ngag rigs so so yang tha snyad yin/ mi 'gyur ba'i rigs su 'dus pa bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das bsrung ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// dam tshig nyid dang spyod pa dang// lha tshogs pa dang phrin las dang// bsgrib pa dang ni bsti na skyes// rdzas chen lnga dang nyon mongs lnga// thabs chen nyid kyi dam tshig pa// yan lag dam tshig lnga gnyis 'du// bla med mi spang bla ma bkur// sngags dang phyag rgya rgyun mi gcad// yang dag lam du zhugs la dga'// gsang ba'i don phyir smra mi bya// yan lag dam tshig lnga gnyis kyi// lnga gnyis phrag gi re re la'ang// mkhas pas bcu phrag gnyis gnyis dbye// rtsa ba'i dam tshig lnga la yang// shes rab stobs dang ldan pa yis// bcu phrag gsum gsum re re la'ang// rmongs pa ma yin gsal bar byed// dam tshig nor bu rin po che// sa gzhi rgya mtsho'i rdo rje grub// phyal pa gcig bu stong pa rdzogs// 'byung ba chen po bcom ldan 'das// chub par gnas pa bcom ldan 'das// 'gro ba kun la rang bzhin gnas// phyin ci log tu rnam brtags kyang// mdor bsdus dam pa ma lus pas// grol ba rang

byung gzhan las min// bde ba chen po'i rgyud las/ gsang ba'i man ngag dam tshig ma lus par bstan pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po skyon gyis bgor med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// bde gshegs rgyal ba'i sku nyid la// dpag med sgrib tu mi rung phyir// skyon gyis bgo ru med pa ste// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug can// nga rgyal phrag dog kun spyod pas// bla med theg pa'i mchog nyid la// mchog tu gyur pa'i sgrub byed pa// de nyid mchog de bla na med// rigs ngan gdol pa sme sha can// theg dman lta ba log pa dang// ma rab rmugs spugs pa la logs// gsang ba'i don du sgrub pa rnams// theg mchog 'di las 'grub par gsungs// mtshams med lnga dang dam med dang// rkun po chom rkun dmag dpung dpon// sdig pa'i 'khor lo bsgyur ba'ang// bla med theg pa chen po yi// theg mchog 'di la bsgrub par bya// srog gcod dga' dang g.yems pa dang// gzhan gyis ma byin blangs pa dang// brdzun dang smra dang brnab sems dang// rtag tu 'dod pa spyod pa rnams// bla med theg pa'i snod du bsngags// ma srin bu mo sbyor byed cing// gshang gci zas su za ba dang// dge slong bsam gtan dkrus skur zhing// lha khang mdo sde sreg byed de// dam pa'i chos kyang 'dzin par byed// skal ldan skyes bu de nyid dang// yang dag sangs rgyas dbyer med de// tshogs chen gnyis dang rdzog par rol// shan pa spu gri rno thogs shing// 'gro drug gnas su dag byed pa// thar lam dpa' bo byang chub sku// sangs rgyas kun gyi gshegs shul bde// rtog med mnyam nyid chos kyi sku// gzung bas mi zin chu zla 'dra// kun tu bzang po'i rol pa yis// a li ka li zab tu bstan// e ma ho chos kyi don 'byung ba// chos bdag spyod pa rnam par dag/ gtsang me med par kun za zhing// snying rje med par kun gsod de// mthong ba'i yul rnams sbyor byed na// de nyid theg pa'i mchog ces bya// bde ba chen po'i rgyud las/ gsang ba'i man ngag bla na med pa'i theg pa spyod pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po/ dkyil 'khor thams cad la khu ba dang gshang gcis mchod nas/ rgyal po yin pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// mchog gsum srid gsum dkyil 'khor la// tsan+dan dri yis dbul mi bya// 'dod yon lnga pos mchod bya zhing// bdag las dkyil 'khor med shes te// dkyil 'khor bdag po bdag nyid la// mnyam pa'i grub rdzas gshang gci yi// lus bskus za zhing mchod byed pa// des ni

rigs rnam kun mnyes te// lha mo rnams kyang tshim 'gyur zhing// byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba'i phyir// nges med snod gsar snod rnying du// bshang gci mi gtsang khu khrag rnams// snod ldan mkhas pas rab bkang ste// bdag nyid dkyil 'khor chen po la// nyin re nub re dbul bar bya// lnga pa'i dkyil 'khor mnyes gyur nas// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor ma lus 'grub// bla na med pa'i dkyil 'khor mthong// dpag tshad 'bum brgya'i dkyil 'khor nyid// bskyed spros bsdus bkod gsal byas nas// mchod pa la sogs sar pa'i snod// mdzes pa'i mchod pa phul byas la// byin gyis mi brlab mi mnyes te// grub pa mngon du 'byin mi 'gyur// thabs mkhas pa yis bdag mchod pas// 'bum brgya'i dkyil 'khor mchod pa dang// kun 'grub dngos grub chen po yin// bdag mchod dkyil 'khor khyad par yang// dkyil 'khor khro gnyer cha lugs kyi/ khro bdag chen po'i lugs bzung nas// yi ge mngon du gyur na yang// zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor mthong ba min// bde ba chen po'i rgyud las/ gsang ba'i man ngag bdag nyid la bdag nyid kyi mchod na/ dkyil 'khor kun mchod pa yin bzhin// mi rtog pas mchod pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das don dam pa'i de kho na nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// de nas gsang 'dzin rgyal po yis// gsang ba'i don 'di gzung bya'i phyir// bcom ldan 'das la gsol btab te// dam pa bshad par zhu gsol bas// dbang phyug dam pa kun bdag gis// sna tshogs dkyil 'khor gsum du bsgom// dus gsum 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams// sku gsung thugs la longs spyod do// nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbus gnas pa'i// rdo rje mi 'gyur brtan pa'i sar// bla med shes rab gcig tu mtshungs// ye shes thar lam sgrub byed pa'i// spyod pas sems cad thams cad gsod/ khams gsum 'gul ba kun bsad nas// mi bskyod sangs rgyas zhing dag tu// rigs mchog rgyal po rdo rje'i sku// ngo bo nyid gtsang gos pa med// kun rdzogs byang chub spyod mdzad pa'i// rlabs chen sangs rgyas rgyun mi 'chad// gti mug dkyil 'khor rab bsgoms nas// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor der// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad sogs// zhe sdang nga rgyal 'dod chags dang// phrag dog la sogs dkyil 'khor la'ang// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus rdzogs// dam pa'i dkyil 'khor lnga nyid du// dbang 'dod bskur na bsgyur nus dang// rig 'dzin sangs rgyas mchog 'dod pas// lnga pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di las 'byung// de dag thams cad nye

bar bsgrub// mi phyed sku gsung thugs ldan pa'i// 'dod chags la sogs dkyil 'khor 'di// rigs kyi dam tshig yang dag ste// gsang sngags rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// bdag med ye shes las byung ba// rdo rje gsang ba'i don bsgrub pas// sangs rgyas thams cad bsgrub bya'i phyir// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di rnams bsgom// dkon mchog gsum po gang mchod pas// lnga pa'i dkyil 'khor brten byas na// mchog gsum 'grub cing snying po yang// brten pas ye shes thob par 'gyur// dkyil 'khor 'di la blo dman pa// lta ba log pa'i 'du shes can// ngan skyugs za zhing sangs rgyas spong// sngags kyi spyod pa su spyod pa// de ni lta ba'i don mkhas te// sngags kyi spyod pas spyod pa'i mchog/ nam mkhas kun gyi rjes 'gro ste// chos kyi dkyil 'khor ma lus pa'ang// nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor khongs su 'du// de bzhin dkyil 'khor ma spangs pa// dkyil 'khor chen po ye sangs rgyas// rnal 'byor de spyod skal ba bzang// bdag dang gzhan don mi byed pas// sgyu ma lhun grub yul la rol// rang byung dkyil 'khor rang la rdzogs// mi len mi 'dor nam mkha'i ngang// rnam par mi rtog dkyil 'khor las// kun rdzob sgyu ma rol pa yi// gti mug dkyil 'khor bstan pa mtshar// bde ba chen po'i rgyud las/ gsang ba'i man ngag don dam pa'i de kho na nyid las/ nyon mongs rnam par dag pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po lnga'i rang bzhin yin pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos/ dngos grub sdud pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor rmad// dngos grub mchog gi snying po ni// bcom ldan 'das te nr-i yi sku// nr-i thal rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// gsang sngags snying po kun bsdus pa// 'gro lnga la yangs bdud bzhir ldan// lus dang ngag dang sems rnams ni// rang sa nyid na mi dmigs te// gang na'ang mi gnas mnyam pa nyid// sku gsung thugs te rdo rje'i sku// 'jig rten khams ni mtha' klas par// sangs rgyas rgyal bas btsal dka' bas// mkha' dbyings dag pa'i dbus gnas par// dkyil 'khor hUM du kun 'dus phyir// tsit+ta hUM du rnam par bsgom// rang gzugs hUM du rab tu brtags// hUM gi dkyil 'khor 'od mo che/ kha dog rnams la 'phro bas bsam// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal ba'i gtso// tsit+ta hUM de de ma thag/ sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje 'dzin// gtso bo hUM de dbang phyug mchog/ rigs kyi dkyil 'khor tham cad kyi// sku rnams snying po hUM las 'dus// yi ge mchog tu gyur pa'i hUM// phung po'i dbus na 'od 'bar te// zhig pas rdo rje rtse lnga

gsal// rgyal ba'i snying po rdo rje de// rdo rje che mchog rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje snying po brtan pa la// 'khor lo la sogs 'dus pa te// hUM bzhi dkyil 'khor ngo mtshar rmad// zhig pas sangs rgyas byang chub lam// 'di ni dngos grub rgya chen te// 'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar dang// 'byung bar ma nges sangs rgyas la'ang// gsang ba mnyam sbyor dngos grub ni// yi ge zhig tshul 'di las med// btsal kyang rgyal bas mi rnyed de// dngos grub don chen 'di las med// rdzogs ldan dbang po'i sbyor mkhan gyis// dbang po kun sbyor mi rtag pa// ri mo'i gzugs brnyan kun gsal nas// rdo rje 'dzin la mi chags par// chags pa kun la ma chags pa// de ni chags mchog rgyal po yin// dngos po gang la mi dmigs pa// bsnyen pa ma lus yongs su rdzogs// che ba'i dngos grub rnyed dka' ba// shes rab thabs la brten pas 'grub// ming tsam gzhan la brten 'dra yang// mngon sum bde ba rang las 'byung// bde ba chen po'i rgyud las/ gsang ba'i man ngag mtshan ma'i dngos grub dang/ mtshan ma med pa'i dngos grub rnam pa gnyis/ bsgrub pa'i le'u te bcu pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das bsgom du med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// sangs rgyas byang chub gang bsgrub pa// yi ge med pa'i don la blta// snying po med pa'i gsung ba brtag/ byang chub tshul mchog bde chen te// ye shes rdo rje sprul pa ni// sangs rgyas rgyu 'bras mi phyed pa'i// yi ge med pa'i chos las byung// de phyir skyes bu sprul pa nyid// sku yi cha lugs nges mi gnas// snang med don la dpag mi lang// chos kyi 'khor lo dam pa ni// sprul pa'i mdzad pa rdzogs tshul du// snang med snying po mchog gi sku// ye ge med pa'i rgyud las grags// sangs rgyas kun dang de bzhin dang// ston pa rdo rje kun gyi thugs// ye shes lnga ldan snying po'i snying// gsang ba'i snying po nges pa yi// 'bras bu kun gyi lam gyur pa// ye shes rdo rje mkha' 'dra ste// cir yang mi dmigs gti mug dang// dus bzhi'i sangs rgyas ma lus kyis// bskal pa gsum du btsal gyur kyang// sangs rgyas kyis kyang mi gzigs te// sku gsung thugs ldan lus can gyis// snang med mthong bas sa gsum rdzogs// sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpas kyang// sangs rgyas mngon shes dam tshig mchog/ dmig med nam mkha' lta bu'i dbus// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dam pa nyid// dmigs pa med pa rnyed nas smin// sangs rgyas byang chub sem dpa' yi// dgongs pa mi 'gyur btang snyoms/ dang// sngags kyi snying po mi sems zhing// phyag rgya'i mchod pa mi 'dzin te// yi ge rdzas la ma chags nas// mchog

gsum dri ma med pa'i mgon// bsam gtan nyid du 'dus bsam pa// snang mdzad ye shes lnga la sogs// sangs rgyas nam mkha'i khams mnyam pa// sangs rgyas mchog gi gnas su bsgom// lugs ma la sogs phyag rgya la// rnam par grol ba'i lam la gnas// gzhi des rgyal ba'i lam rnyed na// thams cad phyag rgya'i ngo bor gnas// ye shes 'bar ba'i gzhal med khang// gdan dang mchod par bcas pa nyid// rang rig mnyam pa'i snying po la// ye nas rdzogs te ngo bor gnas// mnyam pa'i snying po ngo bo de// bstan du yod pa ma yin pa// bzhin 'byung rgyu la mi gnas te// me long dag pa nyid la gnas// kun sbyor gsum gyi snying po la// mtshon du med pas rgyal ba'i lam// rdo rje nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor che// 'khor lo sangs rgyas 'bar 'od sku// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dbus gnas te// mi dmigs btang snyoms mnyam bzhag na// sangs rgyas yang dag mchod dang 'dra// snang ba med pa'i chos nyid la// ma btsal bzhag na bsgom pa yin// de dang der ni rnam btsal na// de las de bzhin don ni 'byung// yang dag sangs rgyas lam ring 'gyur// nang dang phyi rol don nyid la// chags med gnas pa med pa yis// de la gang 'gog thar lam mchog/ rdo rje mi phyed gsum sgom pa// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du 'du// de la reg na chu srin gyis// gang zin mi gtong tshul du gnas// bde ba chen po'i rgyud las/ gsang ba'i man ngag dngos po 'di lta bu zhig bsgom du yod ces bstan par ma gsungs pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das sbyang du med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// byang chub sems ni rdo rje'i sku// bka' yi 'khor lo rab bskor bas// sku gsum sku ni a yin te// gang yang mi phyed rdo rje'i sku// dbye ba mthar spangs spros bdag med// sgra ming tshig las 'das pa na// rang gi ngo bo bstan du med// 'jigs med dpa' ba'i sa thob pa// sangs rgyas sa la sbyang mi dgos// dngos med ngo bo nyid kyis dag/ rdo rje theg pa bla na med// ma skyes pa yi chos rnams la// dngos por bstan par ma gsungs te// rgyal ba rnams kyis bskyed par bstan// e ma ho chos rnams rmi lam tshul// snang stong ngo bo nyid kyis dben// byang chub sems dpa'i sa rim gnas// shes rab bla med mchog gi sa// sngags kyi spyod pa mchog spyod rnams// chos mchog mi g.yo brnyes 'dod na// 'dod pa ma lus brten pa ni// chags pa'i ye shes 'dod la spyod// sa rnams sbyong ba mthar phyin nas// de la me long chu zla bzhin// snang ba nyid la 'phel 'grib med// sangs rgyas sbyong ba grub pas kyang// 'dod pa'i yon tan

brten pas 'grub// gzugs la chags med chags bral nas// dang po lnga la chags par bya// sa nyid sbyang du med par gsungs// bskal pa gang+gA'i bye snyed kyi// 'gro ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa// zhing dang grub la sbyor byed pa// sngags kyi bdag po rnal 'byor pas// byang chub mchog tu bsgom byas te// skad cig yud kyis kun bsad na// rgyal ba rgyal ba'i sras su skyes// kun rdzob tha snyad bral bas na// don dam yang dag byang chub ni// snang dang mi snang rtsol bral bas// thams cad rang bzhin med par zhi// sgyu ma mi g.yor la sogs bral// rtog pas bgrang ba'i sa las 'das// rgyu 'bras dbyer med mnyam pa'i sku// chu zla'am rmi lam la sogs ltar// rang rig nyid la kun gsal bas// rang rig de yang 'di 'dra zhes// gzhan la bstan du med pa'i phyir// rang rig rang byung rang bzhin bzhag/ mi rtog dbyings las 'das pa'i phyir// mnyam pa'i snying po chu zla la// sku dang ye shes brtag mi bya// cir yang dmigs med mi g.yo la// snying po chu zla'i tshig las 'das// bsam zhing sgrub pa las 'das pas// tshig gi tha snyad kun dang bral// bsgom zhes dmigs pa'i yul med pas// bsam gtan lung la gnas pa min// lung zhes ming du gdags min pa'i// tshad ma gzhan gyis bcos su med// gcig pa ye rgyar ye gnas pas// sangs rgyas kun kyang rgya yis btab// kun tu bzang po'i ngang nyid kyis// rol pa rnam par rol bya'i phyir// ye nas kun bzang kun gyi sa// che chung rgya khyon mi dpag pas// brtan g.yo rnam pa gnyis kyi gzhi// mi chags mi rtog mi gnas pas// ting 'dzin ro la chags mi gnas// dngos por 'dzin pa ye sbyangs pas// dngos med ming yang med pa'i phyir// mchog tu gsang ba'i chos nyid ni// rna dbang gzhan la thos mi 'gyur// de bzhin lce yi dbang pos kyang// de la brjod du rdul tsam med// tha snyad yul las 'das pa yi// bsngo ba'i cha shas phral ba ni// 'di zhes bstan du med pa'o// bde ba chen po'i rgyud las/ gsang ba'i man ngag rdzaugs pa'i sa la 'das shing sa sbyang du med par bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// lag na rdo rje 'chang rgyal gyis// dpa' bo chen po thams cad la// bsnyen bsgrub rnam bzhi gsol btab pas// bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos/ bsnyen pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// sku yi dkyil 'khor bye ma snyed// gsung thugs grangs kyang ji snyed pa// mngon shes lngar ldan sangs rgyas kyi// dkyil 'khor nye bar bsgrub pa na// rdo rje'i sku dang gsung thugs kyi// 'jig rten khams ni rab bkod do// thams cad rdo rje sems dpa'i sku// bsam gyis mi khyab [(]2[)]

gnas byas nas// dkyil 'khor lhun gyis grub 'bar ba// bdag nyid byang chub sems kyi sku// de bzhin rnam snang la sogs pa'ang// rdo rje sems dpa'i skur 'bar ba// de bzhin byang chub sems sku de// ji ltar 'bar yang bdag nyid kyi// byang chub sems las ma g.yos te// rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa// byang chub sems dpa' rab bsnyen pa// 'di ni bsnyen pa'i mchog ces bya// nye bar bsgrub pa'i mchog rnams ni// rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i// skye mched khams rnams dpyad pa'ang// gad+gA'i rdo rje sems dpa' bzhin// byang chub sems kyi bdag nyid sku// de ni bsnyen pa zhes bya ste// sngags kyi bdag pos rab tu gsungs// dkyil 'khor de rnams bsgrub mchog phyir// rig pa'i snying pos skur bsgoms te// oM AHhU~M trAM sogs 'bar te// snang stong ngo bo gang dben pa// de ni bsgrub pa'i mchog kyang yin// sngags kyi bdag po bsgoms pa yis// bsgrub pa'i tshe na snying po bskul// dkyil 'khor gang yang rung ba zhig/ sgrub pa chen po byed pa'i tshig/ rang sngags yi dam lha nyid kyi// snying po bzlas byas rdo rje 'dzin// gang yang rung ba'i skur nges pa'i// rdo rje sems dpa' nga nyid ni// dbu rgyan tshul du bsam byas nas// bdag po de yi gsang sngags kyis// ye shes rdo rje 'grub par 'gyur// bdag po dbu la yod pa des// rdo rje sems dpa'i spyan mnga' nas// 'gying ba'i tshul gyis gnas pa yi// mkha' la bsnyen pa'i lha bkod de// bdag po'i rdo rje lam nas ni// mkha' yi pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor du// bdag po'i bdag nyid pad+mor 'khyil// de ba'i lha mo klu mo'i gzugs// shin tu ngo mtshar che ba yang// dag pa'i ye shes chen po yis// byin gyis brlabs te bsgom par bya// sgrub pa chen por bsnyen par rdzogs// bsnyen pa'i dam tshig sbyor shes na// nye ba'i bsnyen pa 'byung bar 'gyur// nye ba'i bsnyen pa gang yin pa// rdo rje sems bzhin bsgom shes na// sgrub pa chen po'i rang bzhin gsal// gsal ba'i thig le 'od 'bar ba'i// dkyil 'khor 'bum stong ma lus pa// byang chub sems su sbyong shes shing// ngo bo de la sdud shes pa// bsnyen pa'i dam tshig shes pa yin// de ni nye ba'i mchog kyang yin// bsgrub par bya ba'i gzhi yin pas// sgrub pa chen por sbyor bar bya'o// a ni bsnyen pa'i dkyil 'khor te// oM ni nye ba'i bsnyen pa yin// hU~M ni sgrub pa zhes bya ste// swa ni bsgrub pa chen por gsungs// hU~M ni bdag po'i dbu la gnas// 'od dpag med pa'i gnas rab tu// skad kyi 'gro byed 'byung 'jug na// sangs rgyas lag gis gzung du rung// sangs rgyas bsnyen pa'i dam tshig ni// sbyor shes rgyal ba'i sras po yin// shes rab bla med pa de la// yud kyis sbyor ba

gang gnas pa// sangs rgyas rig pas bsnyen pa yin// sangs rgyas rig pa dbyer med par// bla med ma la mnyam gnas pa// bsgrub pa'i dam pa sngags kyi tshig/ de ni sgrub pa chen po'o// bsnyen pa rnam pa bzhi po yang// gcig la bzhi bzhir dbye bar bya// rnam par dag pa'i dkyil 'khor du// dbye ba med pas bsnyen pa'i mchog/ lhun gyis rdzogs pas nye bsnyen po// thams cad sbyar ba bsgrub pa che// blang dor med pas bsgrub pa'i mchog/ 'di ni brtul zhugs drag shul gyis// gnas su bya ba'i gzhi med de// a dang par ni rnam ldan ni// sgyu ma'i bde ba 'byung bar 'dod// de yang 'dzin pa'i skyon yin pas// rang bzhin gcig tu ma nges pas// ji ltar bltas pa der snang ste// snang 'dod rtsol sems bde ba dang// bsnyen bsgrub la sogs dkyil 'khor yang// de ni der sgrib skyon chen yin// byang chub yan lag kun gyi sgo// cha lugs bsgom pas chu zla bzhin// ma chags ma gos 'byung 'gyur yang// bsgoms pas byis pa'i spyod yul 'dra// bde ba chen po'i rgyud las/ gsang ba'i man ngag bsnyen bsgrub rnam pa bzhi'i dbye ba gol sar bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu+u bzang po mi gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// 'khor ba myang ngan 'das pa gnyis// ci la'ang mi rtog mi gnas te// rnal 'byor bskur de 'jug pa yis// mi rtog pa la'ang mi bsam phyir// so sor rtog pa'i shes rab kyis// dam pa'i don nyid bden pa'i lam// smra bsam yul las 'das pa la// rgyu dang rkyen las byung ma byung// rang gi ngo bos mnyam dpyad pas// thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis zhi// pha rol phyin bcu ye shes gcig/ sgyu ma rmi lam la sogs pa'i// bag chags glo bur sprin tshul du// med las yod brtags yod nas med// zhi ba'i ye shes bying rmugs kyis// ting 'dzin ro la chags gnas pa// nyan thos 'gog par lhung bar 'gyur// bsgom mo snyam pa'i blo byung nas// stong nyid sgro med zhi gnas la// 'du shes med par mnyam bzhag la// yid kyi rnam rtog mi rtag pas// tha mal 'du shes spangs tsam las// mnyam rtog mnyam par sbyar ba min// ye shes snying po'i sa nyid la// dus rings sbyar nas 'grub tu rung// byung tshor rjes su sems gtong zhing// ting 'dzin ro la chags gyur na// rtag chad mu gnyis mtha' mi sel// ma rabs bus pa mtha' ma'i sems// 'du shes med pa'i khrod du skye// re dogs sems la mi gnas par// yang dag dmigs med don bsgom ste// ci la'ang mi sems mi dmigs shing// gang yang mi 'chos mnyam gzhag nas// rdul tsam 'dzin pa'i

sems med pa// dais kyang chos dbyings dam pa ni// skye med ma bcos shes rab klong// dus gsum mchog gsum sku gsum dang// ye shes b+ha gar gting 'gag pa'i// mchog gi snying po phreng ldan gyis// kun 'byung ye shes rgyal po ni// mthong min snyam du rung ba min// log rtog mtshan ma thams cad la// 'du shes mtshan ma mi 'byung zhing// rtse gcig don la mi g.yeng bar// cha mnyam kun mnyam zhing mnyam na// zhi gnas tshul ni de na yod// sna tshogs 'khor ba'i rang bzhin la// gcig dang du ma med shes te// gcig med du ma mi bsgrub par// gcig la du ma yod byas nas// rtag chad mu gnyis bsal ba'i phyir// bden pa gnyis kyi gzhung bkod nas// grub mtha' kun rdzob so so yis// ngo bo nyid kyis grub mtha' 'dzin// chos rnams sgyu mar yid ches shing// ye shes phreng thogs kun ldan pa// sa dang pha rol phyin la gnas// bsam du med pa'i don de la// rgyal bas bsam du med pa'i phyir// yon tan chen po'i bsam gtan ni// bsam gtan nyid las bsam du med// ma bsams ma sbyangs chos bzhin du// phra ba'i sgo mor ming btags shing// sems kyi dben pas lam tshol zhing// dgon pa'i rgyud du dben 'dzin te// brtags na rnam par rtog 'gyur bsgom// rgyu dang 'bras bur ming btags shing// dge sdig gnyis ka rnam par sel// 'jig rten 'di la 'byung ngo zhes// blang dor brod pa mchog tu bskyod// de yang bla med byang chub kyi// ming tshig bsam gtan las 'das te// yang dag sangs rgyas lam ring pas// de la gnas par mi bya'o// ming tsam tshig gis 'dzin pa ni// sngags kyi tshul ni mi 'byung ste// ma skyes pa yi chos 'di ni// ngo bo nyid kyi khyad par can// mi dmigs rnam par mi rtog las// ye shes sangs rgyas rab tu 'byung// sangs rgyas mi 'byung chos kyang med// dge 'dun mi 'byung bsgrub tu med// chags dang ma chags tshig gi lam// dbu ma bzhin te brag cha 'dra// bde dang sdug bsngal rgyu mthun zhes// 'gro ba'i mgon po sems dpas gsungs// bde ba chen po'i rgyud las/ gsang ba'i man ngag mdo sde la sogs pa'i lta ba la mi gnas te/ lam rim par bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po thams cad sgrol ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// mchog dang mchog phran bsgral ba'i zhing// dbang phyug bum sna la sogs dang// bla med spong zhing bla ma la// smod pa la sogs bsgral ba'i zhing// gsang sngags 'dzin pa'i skur bsgom ste// lte ba brtsibs bcas lter bsam la// lag gnyis rtse mo lnga gnyis la// nyi ma g.yas la zla ba g.yon// rin

po che brgyan gdan bcu la// sems dpa' chen po yab yum bcu// sems dpa' g.yas la sems ma g.yon// yig 'bru sngags kyi rab bkod de// brjod pas skur gyur 'od 'bar dang// dngos po sngon du nyi zla yi// steng na gan rgyal gnas pa yis// snying gar zla ba'i steng nyid du// sgrib pa rnam sel sku bsams te// snying po brjod de thal sbyar bas// sbyor ba'i mtshams nas dgyes sprin 'phro// sgrib pa rnam sel sku nyid kyi// dbu la rigs lnga yab yum gyi// bcu yi dkyil 'khor 'od 'bar bas// lag pa'i 'du byed bskyod tsam na// rnam par sel bas gzhal yas khang// shag gis phye nas sems dpa' blangs// blangs pas tshon gang rgyal ba'i sku// rnam par sel ba 'od 'bar ba// rigs kyi snying pos brjod byas pas// lnga gnyis bcu zhu dbyings su thim// skur gyur rnam par sel bar 'bar// snang srid mchog gsum bsgral byas kyang// bsgral bar byas pa rdul tsam med// spang len med par thar pa'i lam// bcing grol med pas chos kyi dbyings// rang rig rnam par dag gyur na// sems can mchog chen bsad pas ni// rnam par mi grol kun 'gog pa// rnam par snang mdzad kho nar 'gyur// ye nas sems can kun dag pa'i// rgyun gyi ting 'dzin ldan gyur na// mchog chen mchog chen kun bsad pa// yum gyi mkha' la bde sbyar bas// bsgral ba ma yin bde ba'i mchog/ mi rtog ye shes dkyil 'khor du// snying rjes gzung du med rtogs na/ khams gsum ma lus kun bsgral kyang// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid kyi sku// thams cad ye nas mnyam yin te// rtog pa las byung sems can las// sems can sangs rgyas yongs kyis med// rta sha khyi sha ba glang sha/ lang tsho stobs ldan su za ba// rgyal ba rigs lngar skye bar nges// srog ces bya ba nam mkha' ste// nam mkha' la ni nam mkha' nyid// yai nas rol par su mkhas pa// skyes bu dpa' bo thabs chen des// snying rjes bzung ba gang yang med// bskal pa'i me yis nam mkha' bsregs// srid pa'i chu yis rgya mtshos bkrus// ye shes la ni ye shes rol// ye shes rol pa nyid kyang gsog/ mkha' la gzha' thim tshul du ni// srog nyid nam mkha' nam mkhar thim// srog dang nam mkha' gcig pa'i phyir// snying rjes bzung ba'i sems can med// sems can dam par dbye bar ni// rdo rje sems dpas med par gsungs// skyes bu thabs la mkhas pa yis// nyan thos bsad pa don gyi mchog/ dge slong dkrugs pas byang chub zhing// nyan thos mchog chen yin par ni// bcom ldan 'das kyis mchog tu gsungs// shes rab bla med sa 'dod cing// byang chub sa la snyoms 'jug na// mchog de bsgral ba bde ba'i lam// thar lam

gang dang mi mtshungs pa// bde chen 'di la med pa'i phyir// mtshams med bya bas pha rol phyin// shes rab mchog gis sa la gnas// sbyor sgrol bya ba kun byas kyang// rdul cha tsam yang byas pa med// nam mkha'i rtog pa skye med cing// rtog pa de nyid nam mkha' 'dra// mi chags nam mkha' bsam bral las// rang don chen po nam mkha' 'byung// byams pas de nyid rnam sbyang phyir// snying rje chen po cir mi mdzad// che ba'i yon tan rlabs po che'o// yon tan cir yang bsngags pa med// bde ba chen po'i rgyud las/ gsang ba'i man ngag yo ga rnam gsum gyi bsgral ba skyon gyis bgor med pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos sbyor bas grol bar bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// phyag rgya chen por mnyam sbyor zhing// rnal 'byor 'bras bu grub 'dod na// byang chub lam la gnyer bya'i phyir// ma dang bu dang sring mo rnams// byin rlabs 'khor lo'i dbus su gzhag/ rtsibs la rigs bzang mo bzhag la// phyag rgya chen por bsgom byas te// snying gar lag pa g.yon mdzub kyis// lcags kyu'i tshul byas snying ga nas// dkar mo bzung ste bdag nyid kyi// gshang gci bza' zhing snying po bskul// g.yas pa'i mig btegs g.yon phab la// shin tu 'dzum dang bcas pa yis// A+oM bzlas gsang ba'i rdo rje la// A+oM yod mtha' ma hA yis bskor// dkar mo'i b+ha gar muM bsams te// lce gnyis rtse sprad kha sbyar te// dkar mo byin brlabs dbyings chen mo// dbang po rnam gnyis gsang sbyar nas// snying po brjod cing bskul byas te/ khu khrag gshang gci blangs bzas na// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor ma lus 'grub// 'jig rten khams 'di thams cad na// bud med ji snyed yod pa kun// sku yi phyag rgya'i sbyor ba yis// de dag thams cad nye bar spyad// rdo rje pad+mo'i dbus gnas par// mi 'byung de bzhin der bzhag nas// mnyam sbyar gzigs nas mchus brad na// bye ba grangs med gsang sngags 'dzin// sangs rgyas ma lus de las 'phro// rdo rje nam mkha' 'dra ba yi// byang chub 'di yis thob par 'gyur// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// gsang ba chen po'i dam tshig rmad// lha mo nyid kyi spyi gtsug tu// laM gzhag steng du gnas pa ste// sku 'gyur 'phro bas brjid pa dang// hU~M gi bdag pos hU~M brjod do// hU~M 'bar sku ru gyur pa dang// bud med gang yang rung ba de// lha mo hU~M bdag btsun mor brlabs// bud med bu gar rdor bcug dang// gsang sbyar brtan pos bsrub bskyod nas// gnyis su med par sbyar byas te// sangs rgyas ma lus 'phro ba'i phyir// hU~M gi bdag po 'grub par

gsungs// maM pyaM traM rnams gong ma bzhin// bud med lha mo'i tshul 'dzin ma// 'khor lo 'bar ba'i rtsibs bzhag ste// gang yang rung ba'i bud med de// lam gyi tshul du rnam bsam na// lam 'dra'i bdag po 'grub par gsungs// bud med gzhon nu gzugs mdzes sam// yang na dbye ba mi bya ste// dar dang rgas dang mi mdzes kyang// lha mo 'gying bar byin brlabs la// 'gying ma la sogs snying po rnams// hUM la s+ye/ trAM ma le/ hri gIrtI/ a nirti/ snying po brjod de gang yang rung// skur gyur 'od du 'bar ma thag/ gzhon mdzes rgas dang dar la sogs// dngos nyid kho na sbyar byas nas// gtong bar mi byed bsigs nas ni/ khu ba gshang gci zos 'thungs nas// sa snying la sogs bdag por 'gyur// d+hu pe puSh+pe A lo gan+d+he ma'i// snying po brjod byas 'gyur tshul du// bu mo bcu drug lon pa nyid// mchod skur 'dzin pa dmigs byas la// gsang ba'i lam nas khu ba 'byung// pad+ma'i sbubs ni gnyen byas te// dga' mgur rangs pas sgor byung ba// byams pa la sogs skur bsgom pa'i// bu mo dang ni 'thungs lhogs na// mchod pa'i lha mo bdag por 'gyur// kro ta khA hi zhes brjod de// bud med khro gtum ldan pa ni// 'khor lo rtsibs bcas sgo khyud la// gzhag pa khro mo bzhi ka yi// snying po de brjod skur bsams la// bud med dngos su sbyar byas nas/ khu bas dga' mgu tshim byas te/ khu ba gshang gci mi dgag par// dregs mo dang ni gnyis kyis ni// 'thungs shing zos nas khro chen po// rnam rgyal la sogs bdag por 'gyur// de bzhin khro bo 'bar ba yis// dkyil 'khor che mchog bya bar bshad// grangs med bye ba stong dag gis// bud med bu mo'i tshogs rnams kun// rab tu dga' bas gzeng bya yi// 'dod chags kyis ni brten byas te// dbang phyug mar bcas 'khor tshogs la// 'dul ba'i bdag po thabs chen po// dregs pa 'dul mdzad bdag pos ni// snying po brjod byas mos bcug nas// rol pa sbyor bas sad byas te// bu mo dbang phyug mar bsam la// bdag pos dngos su kun sbyar nas// rdo rje'i lam na khu ba dbyung// ut+pal zhabs su 'khyil byas te// dga' bas tshims te sgor byung ba// ce spyang sha la 'drad tshul du// gnyis log 'thungs shing lhogs 'gyur na// dbang phyug ma yi bdag por 'gyur// gzhan yang rgyal mchog dkyil 'khor kun// phro zhing 'du sbyor de bzhin bya// gsang sngags kun bdag dbang phyug gis// ji snyed bud med kun bzung zhing// 'dod chags tshim par byas nas ni// rgyal ba kun dang mnyam yin zhing// rdo rje dgyais pas mnyes par 'gyur// A li kA li mnyam sbyar nas// sprad pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab de// skad cig

yud kyis kun sbyar te// bud med dkar mo rigs bzang mo// lha mo klu mo la sogs dang// the tshom med par sbyar bya ba// rta dang ba glang ma he dang/ khyi dang phag rgod dum dom bu 'am se sogs// gang na gang de klu mo yin// lha mo la sogs blang dor can// mo tshogs mi sbyar gang yang med// rdo dang shing sogs pa la'ang// bsgrub pa che la zhugs tshe na// dkyil 'khor bdag por sbyar bar bya// rnam par rtog pa gsal ba dang// blang dor med par sbyar ba'i phyir// rang rig snang ba rnal 'byor che// the tshom med pa'i sems kyis ni// dam tshig tu ni ma srid sbyar// rnam par rtog pa phyag rgyas bsdams// brjid pas dpal dgyes lhan cig sbyar// rnal 'byor chen po sbyor mkhan des// bde ldan zhing ni 'khor lo bskor// sangs rgyas byang chub bla med lam// mi 'gyur thob pa smos ci dgos// dri med dag pa lta ba yis// sbyar ba thams cad bde gshegs shul// mkha' 'gro zla gsang thig le'i sku// sems dpa' sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos// sa gsum sa rnams kun la yang// bgrod pas rdzogs par ma gyur la// bus pa rtog ges sbyor mi shes// sbyor bas shes rab bla med pas// de nyid yin te the tshom med// dus gsum gcig ste khyad par med// sngon med phyis med gdod nas byung// chos skus khyab pas gcig pa'i phyir// ches pa chen po'i rang bzhin gnas// ci yang dbye ba med pa'i phyir// sbyor ba thams cad bde ba'i mchog/ gsang ba'i man ngag bde ba chen po'i rgyud las sbyor ba dam tshig gi le'u ste bcu drug pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos ji ltar spyad kyang skyon gyis mi gos pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal byang chub sems// de la bskyod pa med bzhin du// nam mkha'i mtha' bzhin mnyam par gnas/ khyad par ci yang mtshungs pa la// las so zhes ni rnam par brtags// ci ste las kyi dbang 'gyur na// rang byung ye shes yod ma yin// rgyu nyid rdo rje rkyen dang 'dra// ma skyes pas ni 'jig pa med// gdod nas snying po byang chub la// btsal ba'i bsam pas dbyings mi bskyod// ye shes dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor nyid// bsam yas dkyil 'khor ji snyed pa// dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor las byung ste// dkyil 'khor ldan pa'i snying po la// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor thams cad gnas// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// snying po brtag mi sgrib pa yi/ khams gsum rdzogs byed dkyil 'khor ro// thabs mchog thabs las byung ba yi// byang chub rdo rje dbang bsgyur nyid// de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nyid de// ji snyed bsam pa mtha' yas pas// rnam rtog theg pa'i kha

brgyud kyang// yang dag snying po don chen ni// gang nas btsal kyang ma rnyed de// mnyam yin kun mtshungs thar pa'i lam// sgro skur skyon gyis mi gos pas// rang rig sgrib med dag pa yi// bsnyen bsgrub dam pa sems yin te// bde gshegs ma nor lam yin pas// de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nyid de// sangs rgyas sgro skur med par gsungs// gsang mchog don gyi snying po nyid// bde ba thugs kyi dkyil 'khor te// spyod yul kun la dbang bsgyur ba'o// yid bzhin rin chen dpag bsam shing// rang sems brtan pa mchog gi snying// rtog ge'i spyod yul ma yin te// zab cing rgya che yangs pa yi// thams cad nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de// shes rab dbyings gnyis 'byor pa'i phyir// dbyings la dbyings ni rnam par sbyor// gzhi rtsa med pa'i dbyings nyid de// pho mo ma ning ma yin zhing/ kha dog dbyibs nyid ma yin pas// yon tan mchog gi gnas yin te// de yis ma bskyed med pa'i phyir// phyogs bcu ma lus thams cad kyis// skyes bu sangs rgyas kun gyis ni// de la bsad cing gzung du med// skye 'gag med pa'i dkyil 'khor nyid// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// ngo bo'am 'bras bu yin pas na// rgyu 'bras med pa'i dkyil 'khor te// skye 'jig med pa'i dbyings nyid la// mi 'gyur g.yung drung sku bzhugs shing// tshogs chen gnyis dang rdzogs par rol// ye shes snang ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid// snang dang mi snang gnyis ka min// yod dang med pa dbyer med de// rang bzhin ye nas dag pa yis// ma byung mi skye'i snying po 'di// ma bcos ma byas ngang gis gsal// bde dang sdug bsngal rgyu mthun zhing// bdag la bdag ni dbang bsgyur bas// zhig dang bshig par bya ba min// cis kyang mi tshugs rdo rje'i bdag/ chos rnams ma lus sangs rgyas pas// byang chub snying po thams cad 'dus// phyi nang ma lus thams cad kun// byang chub snying po'i sku ru blta// mchog gi nang du gnas pa de// ngan song ye sbyangs byang chub sa// rang bzhin med las cir yang snang// yi ge'i tshig dang sgra langs pa'i// brjod med ngang du gnas pa 'di// sgra dang tshig la me gnas shing// thugs te thugs la mi gnas pas// cis kyang sgrib tu yod pa min// bde ba chen po'i rgyud las/ gsang ba'i man ngag gi snying po la/ skyon gyis bgor med pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos lta ba mtha' yas pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// sgyu ma'i dkyil 'khor 'di nyid kyi// 'jig rten 'di na ci yod pa'i// ming dang tha snyad 'dzin pa rnams// mtshan nyid so sor gzhig byas nas// yod

min med min mi dmigs te// rang byung ye shes skal chen po// rang bzhin med de yang dag nyid// sus kyang ma byas rang byung ste// thams cad dbyings su ro gcig pas// thams cad dbyer med byang chub lam// mnyam pa'i dbyings su thams cad skyes// skyes pa nyid na skye ba med// las dang las kyi bag chags med// bsod nams thams cad dag yin pas// cis kyang ma gos thams cad 'joms// mi 'gyur g.yung drung rdzogs chen sku// skye shi med pa'i sa yang yin// chos kyi dbyings dang sems can ni// gnyis med de bzhin nyid du gcig/ rnam par byang dang nyon mongs gnyis// so so ma yin gcig gi ngang// skye med ngang du thag chod pas// nyon mongs gnyen pos bcos su med// gdos pa can gyi chos min pas// ji bzhin de bzhin gnas pa yin// nga med bdag med rgyal ba'i mchog/ kun rdzob rgyu 'bras rnam par dag/ nyon mongs pa nyid byang chub ste// thams cad ma lus bde gnas so// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos ngo bo nyid rnam par dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// dbyings dang shes rab tha snyad gcig/ ye shes 'byung 'jug sems yin pas// ting 'dzin rnam gsum bsgom byas te// nyon mongs las lnga sgo bkag nas// rang rig rnam rtog sad pa yis// lam lnga snang ba rnam rtog yin// rtog dang mi rtog gnyi ga med// gnyis med de nyid yang dag lam// theg pa bsam yas ma lus pa// de bzhin nyid kyis ma brjod kyang// rnam par rtog pa mtha' yas pas// blo yi rig pa'ang de bzhin te// so sor 'tshams par kun la gsal// bla med rdo rje theg mchog nyid// thams cad rtsa ba yin pa'i phyir// rgya mtsho'i klong du chu 'bab bzhin// rgya mtsho'i chu yi ngo bo nyid// ma bsdus rang bzhin 'dus bzhin no// ngo bo nyid 'di theg pa'i mchog/ rgya mtsho pad+ma rin po che// rdo rje'am par ma sku nyid de// ji bzhin nyid las ma g.yos par// srid gsum 'gro ba bsam yas su// nyi ma shar ba'i 'od bzhin du// bde gshegs zhing rnams dag byed pa'i// theg pa'i rnam grangs bsam mi khyab// thugs rjes zhing du byas pa rnams// don du mi 'gyur yongs ma gsungs// don dang mthun pas bstan pa kun// rang byung dbyings su rtogs par 'dus// dri med dag pa'i blo can gyis// skal bar ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// ting nge 'dzin gyis bskyed du med// shes rab gsum gyis dpyad du med// lta bas dpyad de bsgom du med// dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor bsgom du med// spyod yul thams cad ye nas dag/ thams cad mnyam pa'i dkyil 'khor la// rang byung ye shes 'phyo ba yi// thams cad gnyis su med pa la// de la

lam gyis bcos su med// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pas gsol pa// lta ba dam tshig dbye ba dang// lta ba'i mchog ni ji ltar lags// dam tshig mchog kyang ji ltar lags// zhes gsol pas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos/ lta ba dang dam tshig dbye ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// gti mug 'dod chags zhe sdang dang// nga rgyal phrag dog chen po lnga// spangs nas mya ngan 'das mi gnas// ma spangs pa nyid byang chub lam// bdud rtsi rnam lngar rtag tu spyad// yon tan ji bzhin rdzas kyi mchog/ bla med 'grub pa'i rgyu yin pas// gtsang sme med par bza' bar bya// sangs rgyas nor bu 'grub par 'gyur// rang gi lta ba dam tshig yin// lta ba gud na yod min te// dam tshig nyid ni lta bar gsungs// de phyir lta ba dam tshig gnyis// zungs su gyur pa'i ma nor lam// dam tshig sbyor ba'i mchog yin te// sgrol ba lta ba'i mchog tu gsungs// sbyor ba nyid na sgrol ba ste// sgrol ba nyid na sbyor ba yin// sbyor sgrol lta ba dam tshig bzhi// ngan song gnas rnams stongs par byed// bla med zhing la rab tu sbyor// tsha ba rnams la bsil ba'i sman// grang ba rnams la dro ba'i sman// bsil drod 'jam rtsub cha snyoms pa// rtogs pa'i lta ba de ltar ston// sangs rgyas zhing khams rab 'byams na// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor dang// sprul pa bsam yas 'byung ba yang// lta ba'i byin gyi rlabs las byung// phyogs bcu dus bzhi thams cad kyang// rtog pa'i mtshan ma so sor snang// yang na dam tshig lta bar 'dus// dam tshig lta ba'i don rtogs na// sku dang ye shes bsam mi khyab// rang rig ye shes don rtogs na// skye shi med pa'i g.yung drung thob// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug kyang// byang chub chen po'i lam las byung// kun spyod yon tan rnam lnga yang// chos nyid dbyings kyi rgyan zhes gsungs// shes thabs thabs mchog phyag rgya yang// byang chub chen po las byung zhing// mtha' dang dbus med du ma yin// gang du'ang mi 'gro kun tu khyab// kun la de bzhin mi gnas pa'o// nam mkha' rtog pa skye med cing// rtog pa de nyid nam mkha' 'dra// mi chags nam mkha' bsngo bral las// rang don chen po nam mkha' byung// bde ba chen po'i rgyud las/ gsang ba'i man ngag lta ba dang dam tshig gi le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o//// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dri ma med pa'i dkyil 'khor rnam pa gnyis kyi don bshad du gsol/ zhes gsol ba btab pas/ bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos dkyil 'khor rnam pa gnyis gdon pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de

bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis po 'di phyung ngo// e ka kha ga g+ha nga/ tsa tsha dza dz+nya nya/ Ta tha Da D+ha Na/ pa pha ba b+ha ma/ ya wa ra la/ sha Sha sa ha k+Sha/ i I/ a U/ e ai/ o au/ dzaHhU~M ba hoH zhes pa de phyung bas/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sku'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyur langs so// phyogs bcu dang dus bzhi g.yos so// stong gsum dang/ stong gcig dang/ stong gnyis dang/ 'byung ba lnga g.yos so// rab tu g.yos so// kun tu g.yos so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// dkyil 'khor chen po rang la gnas// rang gi phung po lnga po ni// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lnga yin la// rnam shes skye mched khams rnams kun// byang chub sems dpa' sems ma yin// ma bslad dkyil 'khor ngo bo nyid// sa chu spyan dang mA ma kI// me rlung gos dkar sgrol ma ste// nam mkha'i khams kyi shes rab yum// phyogs bcu'i stong khams ye nas dben// rang byung srid pa'i dkyil 'khor che/ khro bo yab yum sgo ma bzhi// dkyil 'khor chen po 'bar ba'i 'od// phyogs bcu rgya yongs ma chad pa'o// 'og min gyi gnas chen po mtha' dang dbus med pa de ni/ gzhi dpag tu med pa'i ye shes kyi 'khor los rab tu 'od gsal ba tshad med pas/ gru bzhir gyur pa sgo bzhi dang/ sgo khyud khyad par gyis mdzes pa/ glo 'bur chen po bzhes khyad par du brgyan pa/ rta babs dang them skas dang/ rin po che'i rgyan dra ba dang/ dra ba phyed pa dang/ mu tig dang/ asma gar b+ha dang/ chun 'phyang dang/ shar bu dang/ rol mo sna tshogs pa dang/ dri sna tshogs pa dang/ ro sna tshogs pa dang/ reg bya sna tshogs pa dang/ phyogs bcur 'khrigs par 'byung ngo// rang byung ba'i gzhal yas khang gi dbyibs/ rgyal ba'i chos kyi dbyings yin te/ de ni rgyan cha ji bzhin pa 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gsal bar byas te/ ye shes 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang// dkyil 'khor chen po gru bzhi pa// 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi mu khyud bcas// gru chad bzhis brgyan bar khyams dang// kun tu gru bzhi sgo khyud mdzes// rgyan dang rol mo sprin tshogs kyis// ye shes 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid// gzhal yas chen po'i tshul du brgyan// seng ge glang chen rta dang ni// ma he mkha' lding khri yi steng// nyi zla pad+ma rin po ches/ khri brgyan gdan du byas pa la// zhal gcig phyag gnyis rab ldan pa'i// rdo rje rgyal po rgyal mo dang// g.yas nas 'khor ba sa snying dang// nam mkha'i snying po spyan ras gzigs// phyag na rdo rje bzhi po dang// la s+ye ma le la sogs bzhi// sems ma g.yon gzhag 'khor bar bskor// gru chad la ni byams pa dang// kun bzang sgrib sel 'jam

dpal bzhi// mchod pa'i lha mo bzhi rnams ni// sa snying g.yas nas gong bzhin dgod// bar khyams thub drug dgod byas nas// rdo rje 'khor lo'i rgyab mdun du// kun tu bzang po yab yum dgod// sgo khyud la ni khro bo bzhi// g.yas su mo la g.yon du pho/ khro bo yab yum gnyis bar du// dbus su sgo ma bzhi yang dgod// bzang mo mdun la bzang po rgyab// gtso bo dkar po rdo rje 'dzin// me long ser po 'khor lo dril// ye shes sngon po rin chen 'bar// rtogs pa'i ye shes pad+ma dmar// grub pa'i ye shes rgya gram ljang// dmar ser myu gu rin po che// mthing ga ral gri pad+ma dkar// rdo rje ljang skya klu shing dmar// 'khor lo dmar ser snye ma dkar// 'jam dpal ser po ut+pal 'dzin// me long dkar dang phreng ba sngo// lce dmar ser mo ljang skya ma// spos me ser mo me tog mthing// me dmar dmar skya dri chab ljang// sreg par ser po go cha sprin// po ti dmar po rin chen mtsho// rgyal ba sgum la me chu gnas// rdo rje dkar ser be con mthing// sdigs mdzub dmar po dbyug to ljang/ khro bo khro bzhin 'bar ba ste// lcags kyu dkar po zhags pa ser// lcags sgrog dmar mo dril bu ljang// 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor bla na med// 'od zer 'bar ba'i tshogs chen po// dkyil 'khor chen po 'khor lo bskor// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po/ gsung gi snying po 'don pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas gsung gi snying po 'di sku dang gsung dang thugs las phyung ngo// b+h+rUM tsakra bi shud+d+he/ hU~M badzra satwa hU~M/ A+oM bai ro tsa na dzika A+oM swa rat+na swa/ aM a mr-i ta a/ ha pra lo ki ta/ muM d+hA du shwa ri muM/ laM de sha ra ti tsaM/ maM mo ha ra ti maM/ pyaM ra ga lo ga ti pyaM/ tra sa ha hri traM k+Sha gar+b+ha k+Sha/ traM a gar+b+ha ya hrIH pad+ma ba mo hri/ dzi badzra pA Ni dzI/ hU~M la s+ye sa ma ho/ traM ma le sa ma ya s+t+waM/ hrI gIrti ra go/ nirti ya swa hA/ mi li ma hA yA mi swA hA/ th+l+hiM pa tra th+l+hiM swA hA// hU~M k+Sh+yaM khaD+ge ya swA hA/ muM many+dzu shri ga swA hA/ he du kru swA hA/ swa puSh+pa swA hA/ aM ma yu ko su ke ni A+oM swA hA/ ho gan+d+he tsit+ta tra tha swA hA/ hU~M trai lo kya byi ka tra phaT/ hU~M ya mAn+ta kr-ita phaT/ hU~M pad+ma ta krita phaT/ big+nAn ta krita phaT/ hU~M pra dz+nyA ta krita phaT/ A+oM dA ra ma hA e kro d+hI shwa rI dz+wa la ni phaT/ A+oM dA hi ma hA rat+na e kro d+hI shwa rI dz+wa la ni phaT/ A+oM pad+ma ma hA e kro d+hi shwa rI dz+wa la ni phaT/ A+oM karma ma hA e kro d+hI shwa rI dz+wa la ni hU~M phaT/ A+oM a ba mu ni kriM swA hA/ A+oM ni mu ne kruM swA hA/ A+oM k+Sha su mu ne braM swA hA/ A+oM tri mu ne bruM swA hA/ A+oM pri mu ni k+ShaM swA hA/ A+oM du dza mu ni sa sho ka swA hA/ A+oM a a sa man+ta pa he ta swA hA/ badzra b+ha dra sa man+ta/ A+oM hU~M badzra badzra dza dza krung swA hA/ hU~M nyu karma nya swA hA/ pad+ma ku ye swA hA/ haM ha he ha ha swA hA/ gsung gi dkyil 'khor 'di sku gsung thugs

las phyung bas/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du dkyil 'khor du grags so// dkyil 'khor chen po de dag thams cad kyang/ ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor dang ldan par bya ba'i phyir/ ye shes lnga po'i snying po 'di yang thim par byas pa'o// oM ta thA ga to dz+nyA na ma hA swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ A+oM badzra ma hA dz+nyA na swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ A+oM rat+na ma hA dz+nyA na sid+d+hi badzra swa b+ha wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ A+oM pad+ma ma hA dz+nyA na a nu rak+to badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ oM ma hA shU n+ya ta dz+nyA na karma badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ ye shes lnga'i snying po sku gsung thugs las phyung ste brjod pas/ 'od gsal zhing rab tu thim par gyur to// snying po'i sgra yi thams cad kun// dkyil 'khor 'bar ba chen po gsal// dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor las byung ba// dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor ldan// gsung gi dkyil 'khor 'di nyid du// sna tshogs 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs// gsal nyid gsung gi rdo rje'i sku// bya bral lnga gnyis bcu po la// rigs kyi snying po til 'bru tsam// nyi zla nyung 'bru tsam bsams pa'i// steng du bkod de sbyar byas te// snying po brjod byas gar bskor zhing// gung g.yas hU~M bkod gung g.yon muM// gnyis sbyar gzhan brtul brdab tshul gyis// gnyis med 'khril cing dkyil 'khor spro// mdzub g.yas A+oM 'bar g.yon rtse laM// hU~M muM la sogs brtul byas nas// brdab tshul gyis ni gnyis med cing// 'khril bas dkyil 'khor 'phro bar 'gyur// yab yum bcu 'bar gnyis 'khril 'phro// oM tshigs dang po la sogs bzhir// nyi ma yangs 'bru tsam bsams te// mthong byed la sogs yig 'bru bzhi// til 'bru tsam ni bkod byas te// laM mdzub dang po'i tshigs la'ang// 'gying ma la sogs rnam pa bzhi// gong bzhin bkod de brdab tshul gyis// gang brdebs gnyis bkod gzhan brtul te// gnyis med 'khril bas dkyil 'khor 'phro// A+oM tshigs 'bar ba'i A+oM gyi rtsal// nyi ma sran chung tsam bsams pa'i// steng du shing gi snying po nyung dkar gyi// 'bru tsam rab tu bsams byas te// hU~M 'og bar pa'i snye ma yi// snying po yungs 'bru tsam bsams te// a 'og bar pa la yang ni// 'khor lo snying po nyung 'bru tsam// bsams shing ha 'og 'bar ba la// de bzhin ut+pal snying po btsam// laM gyi bar bar zla bkod de// spos kyi snying po bsam par bya// muM gyi 'og gi bar bar yang// me tog snying po bsam par bya// paM gyi 'og gi bar bar yang// mar me'i snying po bsam par bya// traM gi 'og gi bar bar yang// dri yi snying po bsam par bya// sems dpa' brgyad dang sems ma brgyad// thal sbyar yab yum 'khril byas nas// gzhan brtul gnyis 'khril 'od 'bar te// dkyil 'khor chen po 'phro bar

byed// swa rtser 'bar ba tha mar ni// nyi ma'i rtse mor lhag byas na// bar pa mi la lha min tha// zla rtser byol song yi dwags bar// dmyal ba tha mar bkod byas pa// gzhan sbyar ltad mo'i tshul du zhugs// nyi ma'i A+oM rtsar rnam rgyal te// zla ba'i lam rtsar rgyal mo'o// nyi ma'i hU~M rtsar rgyal mo'o// nyi ma'i hU~M rtsar lcags kyu ste// zla ba'i muM rtsar zhags pa'o// nyi ma'i aM rtsar gshed po ste// zla ba'i pyaM rtsar gshed mo nyid// nyi ma'i nyi rtsar rta mgrin te// zla ba'i traM rtsar rta mgrin mo// nyi ma'i mthil du lcags sgrog ste// zla ba'i mthil du dril bu 'bar// nyi ma'i swa rtsa'i mthil bar du// 'khyil ba'i 'od 'bar khyad par 'gyur// zla ba'i mthil bar 'khyil ma ste// yab yum gnyis sbyar gzhan brtul na// sbyar ba'i dkyil 'khor 'od 'bar te// dkyil 'khor ma lus 'phro bar bsam// hUM gi snying po skur bsgoms te// lag gnyis gzhibs pa'i steng du ni// sor bzhi'i dkyil 'khor bris byas la// bum pa'i snying po lngas bkang la// dkyil 'khor dbus su bkod byas la// bla rgyan 'og rgyan bar rgyan rnams// dkyil 'khor chen po la sogs pa// rab tu rgyan gyis brgyan tshul gzhag/ bza' btung ro bro sna tshogs dang// gos l+h+wam phyang 'phrul sna tshogs dang// mchod pa'i bye brag sna tshogs pas// bskor te ting 'dzin gyis mchod pa// 'du shes med pa'i mchod pa ni// mchod pa chen po zhes bya bas// mchod pa chen pos mchod la sogs// gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor grub tshad kyang// 'byor ldan ting 'dzin yod pas bya// sa la sogs pa'i cho ga dang// thig gdab tshon gyi rim pa rnams// dkyil 'khor la sogs chen po'i tshul// dbang bskur yang dag dkyil 'khor nas// bsod nams dkyil 'khor spyan drangs te// dkyil 'khor chen por dang po ni// bla ma'i sems bcug de nas ni// slob ma gzhug cing dbang bskur ba// nus tshad gang 'dod nyams dang sbyar// de bzhin dkyil 'khor chen po ni// dbang chen por ni bskur bar bya// mkhas ldan dkyil 'khor gang 'dod pas// dkyil 'khor gcig gam gsum mam lnga// dgu dang bcu gsum la sogs pa// dbus su rigs kyi sku bsam zhing// sems dpa' sems ma de bzhin dgod// yang na yid la 'thad 'thad dgod// yang na yab yum bcas pa dgod// yang na gang bsgom gang 'thad pa'i// lte rtsibs dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul/ khro bos sgo bsrung bya bar gsungs/ khro mo'i dkyil 'khor chen po yang// de bzhin du ni bya bar gsungs// sna tshogs snang ba thams cad kyang// snang ba'i dkyil 'khor rang bzhin med// de nyid shes rab yin par bshad// bde ba chen po'i rgyud las/ gsang ba'i man ngag gi dkyil 'khor chen po'i

le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das lhun gyis grub pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// ngan song ma lus thams cad kun/ khams dang dbang po dag bzhin du// rkyen gyis bslad pas g.yo bar 'gyur// gzugs la sogs rnams bdag la rtogs// de ni tshangs gnas rim pa skyes// mnyam dang gzugs rnams ma rtogs nas// ming bzhi med par ma shes te// skye mched bzhi las gnas gyur pas// srid pa'i rtse mo'i gnas su skye// de bzhin skye sogs bsam mi khyab// sus kyang ma byas rang bzhin gnas// ngang gis gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor la// cis kyang mi bcos mi bslad de// gnyis su med par rtogs 'gyur na// su yis bcos shing su yis rtogs// kun dang thun mong ma yin pa'i// 'di ltar snang ba'i chos kun dang// phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i sangs rgyas kun// bdag las gud na gcig kyang med// theg pa'i mtho dman kun gyi gzungs// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa'i ma// 'byung ba'i tshul du ldan pa'i sku// gzung 'dzin gnyis med mnyam pa'i klong// thams cad mnyam pa'i ngang gyur pas// phyi nang dkyil 'khor thams cad dang// sgra dang dngos po ji snyed pa// thams cad tshogs kyi snying por rdzogs// dper na gar mkhan lag pa las// ma bkod gzugs tshogs ston pa bzhin// rdzogs mchog bya bral snying po las// ma bkod sku rnams rnam par gsal// bdag dang gzhan du ma brtags na// yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor rnam par ldan// thams cad 'byung ba'i dbyings yin te// sna tshogs glog bzhin rnam par gsal// gsal ba nyid na 'ja' tshon bzhin// rang bzhin med par kun tu bzang// de nyid chos sku yin par bshad// kun gyi sku de rigs mtha' yas// sbas pas dur khrod brgyad zhi zhing// dngos po med pas dngos po'i sgra// sna tshogs rnam par zhi zhing stong// sems la sna tshogs chos rdzogs so// chos kyi phung po khams rdzogs te// nam mkha' mi dmigs mtha' yas la// nyi zla gza' skar kun rdzogs nas// mkha' dbyings dag par rdzogs pa ltar// phung po khams nyid chos yin te// chos kyi dkyil 'khor chos la rdzogs// 'di zhes mtshon du med pa la// mtshon par byed pa rnam rtog ste// ji snyed rnam rtog ma zad par// sangs rgyas byang chub lam mi rnyed// 'byung ba'i tshul du ldan pa yi// rtog med mnyam nyid chos kyi sku// bzung bas mi zin chu zla 'dra// kun tu bzang po'i rol pa yis// A li kA li zab tu bstan// ji ltar rtog pa 'jug pa nyid// mi rjes spre 'us gnon tshul du// bya byed mang pos bdag med par// rang rig stobs kyis dbang bsgyur nas// mtshan ma'i rnam par rtog [(]3[)]

pa nyid// mnyam pa chen po'i klong du gnas// 'du shes 'du byed sna tshogs pas// mi g.yo rang byung thig ler bstan// de dang nga dang bdag med cing// rkyen gyi rdul gyis mi 'go ste// rang bzhin rnam par dag pas na// thams cad bde gshegs snying po nyid// gang du 'gro zhing gang du skye// 'jig rten skye ba'i dngos po med/ khyung chen mkha' la 'phyo ba de// rgya mtshor gnas pa'i klu rnams kyis// lus nyid ma rungs 'jig pa ltar// rdo rje theg mchog bla med pa// bya bral ma mnyam thams cad sdud// rnam rtog zhig pas sa rnams 'joms// theg pa ma lus lto bar za// bsam dang bral ba'i dbyings nyid de// 'di zhes dpag tu med pa'i phyir// yi ge'i rgyud med bsgom du med// bya bral nam mkha' ji bzhin du// mi btsal mi bsgrub mi g.yeng bar// bsgom tshul zad byad spyod tshul gzhom// rang rig snying po mi g.yo bar// rnyed pa'i lam du su 'dod pa// glang po zhon nas rjes gcod tshul// mnyam dbyings dag pa ldan pa la// bor nas sangs rgyas tshol bar byed// e ma ho sangs rgyas spyod yul 'di// btsal bas rnyed pa'i gnas med de// drug gi chos bzhin yul med pas// long bas nam mkha' bsnyabs pa bzhin// gong nas gong du tshangs pa'i mi// bya bral chos dang mthun pa min// ci ste lam la bgrod 'gyur na// nam mkha'i mtha' bzhin mthong ba med// ye nas mnyam rdzogs snying po la// bsgrub dang bsrung bar bya ba med// bsgral dang ma bsgral gnyis med cing// dge dang mi dge'i bsam las 'das// rgyu dang 'bras bu dbyer med de// nyon mongs lnga po spangs byas nas// thar pa byang chub bsgrub tu med// ye nas de bzhin nyid kyi klong// dka' thub bgrod skyong 'bad rtsol gyis// yang dag sangs rgyas lam mi rnyed// sdom pas rtsa ba byang chub ring// dge rtsas sdug bsngal skye bzhir 'gyur// ngan song du yang skye bar byed// smad 'tshong ma dang sbyar byas shing// sems can kun gyi srog bcad na// kun tu bzang po'i sa nyid du// 'byol nyog spyod cing shin tu bde// bde ba chen po'i rgyud las/ man ngag thams cad ma lus kun rdzaugs pa'i lhun gyis gnas pa'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos lta ba sna tshogs pa bltar med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// phyi dang nang med ye shes chen po'i mkha'// kun la kun nyid dpal gyi sku// rang gzhin dkyil 'khor yang dag nyid// de bzhin mnyam rdzogs lhun grub kyis// yul dang rig pa gnyis med par// snga phyi med dbyings de bzhin nyid// rdo rje sems dpa' 'dra ba yang// lta bar snang bas 'bras bu min// 'dus dang mi 'dus

gnas mi gnas// rtsa ba min te ltung ba'i rgyu// sa yang bgrang dang 'jug phyag 'tshal// bskyed dang bsgrub dang mchod pa rnams// ngang gis dag pas ngang gnas pa// dka' thub dka' ba spyad mi dgos// sa dang rtsol bas btsal mi dgos// 'di ni ye shes bla med pa// bgrang zhing 'jug chags bya mi dgos// 'di ni bya med bya las 'das// bskyed dang bsgrub pa bya mi dgos// 'di ni mi skye bde ba'i klong// mchod pa rgyal ba mchod du med// 'di ni rgyal mchog rdzogs pa'i sku// yi ges mtshon par bya mi dgos// 'di ni rang bzhin gsal ba'i 'od// bstod dang bkur dang bkur mi dgos// 'di ni phung po'i dbyibs las 'das// ye shes lnga yi 'od dang bral// 'di ni kha dog dbyibs ma yin// 'di la lta bas blta ru med// lta ba nyid kyi tshig las 'das// 'di la rgyu dang 'bras bu med// gang yang 'byed pa med pa'i mchog/ 'di ni 'dus pa zhes bya ste// rgya mtsho'i klong bzhin thams cad 'dus// gang yang dngaus yod ma yin te// dngos med de nyid sna tshogs snang// snang ba nyid na gang yang min// theg pa sna tshogs kun spyod kyang// dngos med de nyid yang dag nyid// dpa' bos mi tshugs 'bras bu'i mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' nyid kyi tshul// da lta'i bde ba phyi ma'i bde// mngon sum pa dang rgyab nas byung// de yang rnam pa'i skyon yin pas// de la brten par mi bya'o// gdod nas snying po yin pas ni// dus gsum gcig ste khyad par med// byang chub sems dpa' dbang phyug dang// zhing khams rgyal ba ma lus kun// rdzogs pa chen po rdzogs chen po// bsam 'das brjod med mchog gi lam// pha rol phyin pa bcu yi bcu// grub pa mchog gi tha snyad la// sgro dang skur dang rnam pa ye nas rgyal ba'i rnam dag sku// rgyas so rgyas so khams gsum ye sangs rgyas// brjod du brjod du yon tan dbang phyug 'di// brjod pa'i tha snyad las 'das brjod du med// sgom pa nyid ni rtog pa'i rtog pa ste// mi bsgom mi btsal rang rig nyid kyi sku// de bzhin de bzhin de bzhin gyi mthar gzhag/ gzhag du gzhag du'ang gzhag pa med pas na// gzhag tu med pa'i gzhag sar gzhag la gzhag/ gzhag pa gzhag pa'i dngos po rdo rje sems dpa'i thugs// 'di zhes bstan du sangs rgyas nyid kyis med// bde ba chen po'i rgyud las/ gsang ba man ngag ltar med pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o//// gsang ba'i bdag po rdo rje 'dzin pa chen pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin nyid ji ltar lags pa bshad du gsol// zhes zhus pas/ bcom ldan 'das bde dbang kun tu bzang pos/ ji bzhin nyid sna tshogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod

do// e ma ho sna tshogs kun tu ngo bo nyid// gdod nas ma skyes rnam dag byang chub sems// rang bzhin dbyer med gdod nas ma phyed cing// ye nas mnyam pas rgyal ba rgya mtsho yin// dus gsum srid gsum mnyam pa'i snying po nyid// ye nas kun bzang shes rab mchog gi dbyings// dbye bsal med phyir bzang ngan blang dor med// bdag dang gzhan du med byed snying po ye shes nyid// snying po ma mthong shes rab ma sbyangs pas// gzhan du tshol zhing rmongs pa'i sems can gyis// bstan kyang ma thos mtshon kyang ma mthong ba// bdag nyid gzhan du tshol bas sangs mi rgya// de dang ma bral ston pa mi mthong zhing// lam du 'dod pas lam la bgrod 'gyur ba// bgrod pas 'dod sar phyin par mi nus te// don nyid sbag ma lus kyang mi mthong ba// shes shing bsgrub rgyu ci yin gang gis shes// bya byed las 'phags gyi nar 'dug byed pa// gang zhig blo la spyod pa byang chub spyod par 'gyur// rtog dpyod blo yi mtshan ma ma spangs par// dran med mi spong 'khor rgyu mi 'byed do// dwangs snyigs mi 'byed mngon sum sangs rgyas la// 'di zhes don la mtshon du med pa'i phyir// blo yi rig pas don la su sbyong ba// nam mkha'i sprin la mngon gzugs spyod pa yin// nam mkha' med par gang gis shes pa na// sprin zhig 'byung zhing khebs par mi srid do// rnam par dag pa'i g.yung drung sangs rgyas la// thams cad ye nas mnyam gnas rnam dag cing// mi rtog sa ler gnas na rtogs mdzad pa// bdag med bdag chen thams cad 'byung ba'i phyir// ma bkag pa las rgyu zhig 'byung med pa'i// shes rab bla med rgyal ba ma bcos lam// dpyad med dpyod bral bdag 'dzin thabs stobs bral// mkhyen gnas ji bzhin bdag nyid chen po 'di// sus kyang 'di 'dra bstan par gsungs ma yin// ji bzhin pa nyid byang chub yang dag lam// blang dor med pa'i skyes mchog bla med pa// mi g.yo 'du 'bral med pa'i shes rab gzungs// rtogs pa'i ye shes yid bzhin nor bu gter// bstan par dka' zhing don du pheb mi rung// me long gzugs brnyan tshul du sus snang ba// dam pa nyid ni 'di 'dra bstan du med// gti mug tshul du shin tu gsal rig med// lcags kyi sgrom bu theb rgyas btab pa bzhin// nor gzungs dam pa khyad par bstan pa dka'// phyi nang mi sgrib gsal ba'i snying po 'di// thams cad ma nor lta ba ji bzhin nyid// 'khor ba ma spangs sdug bsngal byang chub lam// lta dang blta bar bya spyod yul las 'das// ye shes sgron ma 'dzin 'khrul las 'das pa// thugs rje chen po rol pa'i ye shes 'phye// bsgom dang bsgrub dang bsam dang brjod las 'das// ji bzhin pa

nyid sangs rgyas sangs rgyas pas// ji bzhin pa de de bzhin de bzhin blo// brtan zhing mi 'gyur dam tshig chen po yin// ye nas yangs pa'i snying po sgron ma 'bar// ngo mtshar rmad byung rol pa chen po 'di// bya bral nam mkha' ji bzhin ye nas yin// ci yang mi dmigs gti mug ngang nyid las// rang rig ye shes 'bar ba de ma thugs// ji bzhin pa des sems ni mtshungs pa'i lam// 'gro ba kun gyi rang bzhin de bzhin nyid// mi shes bslad pas 'khrul pa'i phyir// sman nyid sman pa tshogs pa ji bzhin te// rang rig ye shes mi 'gyur bde ba yi// phyi nang gnyis na mi gnas ji bzhin nyid// 'di zhes bstan pa dka' bas bar na'ang med// bde ba chen po'i rgyud las/ gsang ba'i man ngag ji bzhin pa'i le'u ste nyer gnyis pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos dbang bskur ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// ye shes dbang rdzogs rang bzhin rgyal po nyid// dbang byed 'khor lo mnyam gnas chags med gzhi// rang rig rnam gsal ye shes dbang bsgyur dang// de bzhin nyid la rang rig de bzhin gnas// de bzhin nyid de bsam yas 'du 'phro nyid// sku yi sku ste sna tshogs dbang bskur sku// srid gsum dbang bsgyur rang rig rgyal po des// rang gi snying po ma lus mchog gnas byed// gang yang bskul bar bya med las 'das dang// de ni ye shes snying po mnyam dbyings klong// kun 'dus rol pa mdzad pa dbang gi mchog/ dbang rdzogs gti mug ji bzhin bya bral lam// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ma lus rgyal ba'i sku// sku lnga ye shes lnga dang dbang lnga chos// 'du shes 'du mi byed pa mchog gi mchog/ dbang gi 'du mi byed pa mchog gi dbang// sna tshogs dkyil 'khor bsdus pa dkyil 'khor mchog/ mchog gsum rdzogs par gnas pa dbang mchog go/ 'das dang ma byon da lta ma nges kyi// tha snyad ming yang ye nas mi gnas te// skye dang 'gag pa med par rnam brtags ni// 'di ni dus gsum chen po sbyor ba'i sku// gdod nas mnyam pas rim par bkod pa med// gcig dang du ma med pas phyogs su bral// tshogs kyi rgyan rnams mchod par bkram pa'i dbang// lhun rdzogs rang bzhin gnas pas 'drim pa'ang med// lhun gyis gnas pas mi bsdo mi bsam zhing// gdod nas dag pas bdud rtsi yin pa'i phyir// 'du mched bcu gnyis khyad par mchog tu yang// rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pas dbang gi dang// sku gsum ye shes shar bas dbang yang rdzogs// lhag pa'i bsam pas dbang lnga gzung ba med// bde ba chen po'i rgyud las/ gsang ba'i man ngag dbang gi skabs kyi le'u ste nyer
