pa'o// kun tu bzang po che ba la rang gnas pa'i rgyud las/ bzang ngan dang gtsang sme med par rang gnas pa'i le'u ste nyi shu brgyad pa'o//// de nas mtho dman dang che chung med par ma brtsal bar rang gnas pa 'di ched du brjod do// theg pa'i rim pa mtho dman dang// shes rab rtogs pa che chung ni// gar mkhan lag gi 'du byed bzhin// cir yang bstan te cir yang med// rang bzhin

gcig tu ma nges na// sku gsung thugs kyang so sor snang// shes pa gcig tu ma gyur na// byang chub sems kyang so sor go/ de bzhin nyid las gzhan med na// mi mthun rnam pa cir bstan yang// ye shes nyid la mnyam pa med// tshig dang yi ge brjod las 'das// stong gi 'jig rten nam mkha'i khams// ji snyed thug pa med pa dang// til 'bru rta rnga bcur gshags rnams// ma skyes klong du che chung med// kun gzhi ma byung ma skyes pa// ye nas rnam par dag pa la// sangs rgyas che ba ma bcos la// sems can chung bas bcos su med// chos rnams sems su sangs rgyas pas// ji ltar 'dod pa gsil bar 'gyur// mya ngan 'das dang 'khor ba'i chos// che chung med par rang gnas pa'o// kun tu bzang po che ba la rang gnas pa'i rgyud las/ mtho dman dang che chung med par rang gnas pa'i le'u ste nyi shu dgu pa'o//// de nas skye shi dang 'pho 'gyur med par ma btsal bar ye shes su rang gnas pa 'di brjod do// sems dang chos dang nam mkha' la// dang por bskyed pa'i rgyu med pas// tha mar 'chi zhing 'pho mi 'gyur// de bzhin thog ma tha ma med// 'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar dus// tha tshig rtag par gang la 'gyur// dus gsum dus ni med pa'i phyir// sngon dang phyis med gdod nas dag/ skad cig yud la bskal pa'i grangs// ring thung bye brag grangs bstan pa// rnam rtog rmongs par 'gyur snang yang// chos nyid dus las 'gyur snang med// de bzhin tshe tshad la sogs pa// lus med grangs kyis grangs bstan yang// rmi lam pham rgyal bgrungs pa bzhin// grangs dang ring thung brtags pas nor// bdag gi bskal pa bgrangs gyur kyang// thog ma nyid las 'gyur ba med// mtha' dbus phyogs ris cir bstan yang// thig le'i ngang las nyams pa med// 'jigs pa'i bdud dang dgrar snang yang// sems la gzung 'dzin gsad du med// snang srid me dang chur gyur kyang// byang chub sems la 'gyur ba med// med pa ma yin cir yang gsal// gsal tsam nyid na phyogs ris med// yod med brjod pa'i tshig 'das pas// mi 'gyur g.yung drung nyid gnas pa'o// kun tu bzang po che ba la rang gnas pa'i rgyud las/ skye shi dang 'pho 'gyur med par ye shes rang gnas pa'i le'u ste sum cu pa'o//// de nas yang blang dor dang phyogs ris med par rang gnas pa 'di ched du brjod do// skyon rnams byang chub sems yin pas// skyon pas sems kyang yod min te// ji ltar legs par spyad pa che// kun bzang don gyi spyod yul yin// yon tan nyid kyang gzhan med de// ji ltar snang ba thams cad kun// ye nas brtsal med de bzhin

nyid// gzhan nas rgyal bas btsal du med// tshad med blang dor spyod pa'i chos// nam mkha' 'dra ste grub pa med// mkhas pa ye nas yong mi 'dzin// de la cir yang 'gyur ba med// ma btsal rang sems sangs rgyas pas// bde chen gzhan du 'tshol ba ni// brtags shing btsal kyang mi rnyed pas// de bas ma rtogs sems nyid 'tshol// rnam rtog nyid kyang ye shes pas// log rtog zhe sdang gang na yod// phyogs ris med par zhe sdang klong// phyi nang med par ye shes ngang// bzang ngan che chung mnyam pa nyid// skye 'chi 'gyur med byang chub sems// 'khor ba'i log rtog mtshan ma'i chos// mkha' la 'ja' tshon snang ba bzhin// brtags shing btsal bas mi rnyed pas// de bas ma rtogs sems nyid la// ji ltar bstan pa bde ba che// gang ltar spyad pa kun tu bzang// nges pa'i don du nyid gnas pas// don 'di ma rtogs med pa'o// kun tu bzang po che ba la rang gnas pa'i rgyud las/ blang dor dang phyogs ris med pas ma btsal bas ye shes su rang gnas pa'i le'u ste sum cu gcig pa'o//// de nas yang ston pa kun tu bzang pos skye shi med pa'i sems kyi 'khor ba la sogs pa rnams ma gsungs par tshig 'di ched du brjod do// kun tu bzang po'i man ngag 'di// ming tsam 'dzin par gang byed pa// chos nyid rtogs pa shar bas na// sangs rgyas kun gyi rje btsan yin// 'di thos sangs rgyas lag tu len// thams cad kun gyi bdag nyid du// rgyud 'di 'dzin pa'i shes rab gnas// man ngag 'di nyid yin shes na// kun tu bzang po ngas bshad de// gang zhig gang la rtogs 'dod pas// man ngag 'di la blta bar gyis// de skad ces gsungs pa med pa'i kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal pas/ phyogs ris med pa'i snang srid thams cad gnyan pos ma bcos pa'i thabs kyis rtogs pa gcig tu med/ thob pa med pa'i sku thob pa/ grub pa med pa'i 'bras bu thob pas/ rang bzhin btsal ba med par sangs rgyas pa'i don du sus kyang ma bslabs par shes so// man ngag gis kyang ma bstan par rig go/ lta ba thams cad kyi rgyal po kun tu bzang po che ba la rang gnas pa'i rgyud chen po rdzogs so//// bar 'dir dam tshig rgyal po dam tshig bkod pa'i rgyud dpe ma dag pas bzhag yod/ rgya gar skad du/ kA ra shA ri raM dz+wa la tsi ti ka[] ka tan+t+ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ sku gdung 'bar ba tsha tsha dang mchod rten gyi rgyud ces bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i bdag po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ ri ma la ya gnas lcags yod pa'i rtse mo seng ge'i za 'gram lta bu'i gnas na/ bcom ldan

'das gsang ba'i bdag po rdo rje 'dzin chen po la/ lang ka'i bdag po blo gros thabs ldan dang/ klu'i rgyal po gtsug na rin chen blo gros rgya mtsho dang/ tshangs pa gtsug phud 'dzin blo gros mtha' yas dang/ gnod sbyin skar mda' gdong blo gros dad sel dang/ li tsa byi dri ma med par grags pa blo gros rab zhi dang/ chos kyi rgyal po chen po'i pho brang na thams cad theg pa chen po'i don la thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de nas dge slong chen po li tsa byi dri ma med par grags pa rang gi gdan las bzhengs nas/ bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po rdo rje 'dzin chen po la 'di skad ces gsol ba 'deb so// sems can sangs rgyas lam 'dod na// dge ba'i las las khyad 'phags dang// bde gshegs zhabs tog bya ba'i phyir// mchod rten bzheng na ji ltar bya// rnying nas gsar par bzheng na ci// bdag gis sprul pa'i ston pa la// thos bzhin khyod kyis khyad par du// gsang sngags lam gyi mchod rten gsungs// zhes zhus so// de nas gdul dka' 'dul ba'i ded dpon chen po gsang ba'i bdag pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// theg pa thun mong mchod rten dang/ khyad par rgyud lung man ngag lugs// thun mong byung tshul man ngag las/ khyad par gsang ba'i lugs rnams ni// gzugs sku gnyis kyi man ngag rnams/ khyed la bshad kyis rab tu nyon// ces gsungs so// tsha tsha dang mchod rten gyi rgyud sku gdung 'bar ba las/ gleng gzhi dang gleng bslang ba'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i bdag pos theg pa thun mong gi mchod rten gyi byung tshul 'di dag gsungs so// mchod rten lo rgyus lnga yod de// de yang gang dang gang zhe na// mchod rten bla na med pa'i rgyu// yid kyi mchod rten zhes bya dang// rang bzhin gyis grub mchod rten dang// sprul par byung ba'i mchod rten dang// gzugs brnyan rtsigs pa'i mchod rten no// bla med mchod rten zhes bya ba// sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa' yi// sku gsung 'dzam gling phrag brgya las// gling bzhir chags pas mchod rten snang// shar du byams pa brtsegs pa la// lho phyog snying rje rin chen brtsegs// nub tu dga' ba pad+ma brtsegs// byang du btang snyoms don yod grub// 'di dus shAkya thub pa ni// srid rtser byang sems bcu drug dang// dgra bcom bskor nas bzhugs pa'o// yid kyi mchod rten zhes bya ni// nam mkha'i dbyings sam rgya mtsho'i gling// mkhas pas dkyil 'khor mchod rten ni// byang chub sems kyi yid kyis bri// phyag gis rgyas gdab grangs bzung zhing// ngag gis sngags brjod byin gyis brlabs// yid kyis rin chen mchod rten bsam// snang zhing stong la stong zhing gsal// rang

bzhin grub pa'i mchod rten ni// srid pas grub dang sprul pas grub// srid pas grub pas ri rab nyid// de yang ji ltar grub ce na// chos rnams stong pa'i rang bzhin las// ak+Sho b+h+ya'i byin rlabs dang// nam mkhas gsal ba'i go yang 'byed// dmyal ba'i 'jig rten gnas sar chags// don yod grub pa'i byin rlabs las// de las rlung gi dkyil 'khor chags// rlung lha ba dan thogs rnams gnas// rin chen 'byung ldan byin rlabs las// de steng me yi dkyil 'khor chags// me lha'i tshogs rnams de na gnas// snang ba mtha' yas byin rlabs las// chu yi dkyil 'khor rgya mtshor gyur// klu yi gnas kyang de na yod// rnam par snang mdzad byin rlabs las// sa gzhi chen po chags pa la// gling bzhi ri rab grub pa na// gling bzhi gling phran mi yi gnas// ri rab rgyal chen rigs bzhi sogs// gnod sbyin gza' skar lha chen gnas// rtse la 'thab bral man chad nas// gzugs khams gnas ris bcu bdun dang// gzugs med ming bzhi phung por gnas// nyan thos rnams kyang de na bzhugs// bkri ba'i don du mdzad pa'i gnas// sprul pas grub pa'i mchod rten ni// shAkya thub pa lhums zhugs dus// u dum wa ra sbu gur gyur// 'dzam gling sprul pa'i mchod rten gcig/ shAka thub byang chub shing drung bltams// u dum wa ra kha yang 'bus// yid bzhin lhun grub mchod rten byung// shAkya thub pa rab byung mdzad// u dum wa ra ldum bur gyur// nub tu dpe med bsam 'das byung// chu 'gram byang chub dka' thub mdzad// u dum wa ra sdong por 'dril// nub tu rmad grags chos dbyings mdzad// rtswa mchog grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe// sdong po las ni yal ga gyes// byang phyogs yon tan rin chen brtsegs// lang ka pu rir gshegs pa'i tshe// yal ga las ni lo mar gyur/ khams gsum bde rgyas sgron ma byung// bdud btul tho rangs sangs rgyas dus// lo ma las ni me tog shar// shar du byams ldan bsod nams gter// mya ngan 'da' ba'i tshul bstan pa// mthar legs g.yung drung rdzogs pa shar// rang bzhin mchod rten ye shes sku// thugs rje'i byin rlabs rmad po che// mtshan ma'i sdug bsngal yongs bsal zhing// sems can kun la byams thugs ldan// sprul par 'byung ba'i mchod rten ni// byang phyogs rna thos sras kyi spyan// g.yas mthong sreg la g.yon mthong 'jig/ mig mi bzang gis gar bltas sar// mi nad phyugs nad mu ge 'bebs// rgyal pos bcom ldan 'das la zhus// bdag gis ma bsgrubs gnod pa'i mig/ ji ltar thabs kyis bsgyur du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam thos bu'i// phyag tu ring bsrel mchod rten byin// mig ngan smin

mtshams shA ri rAm// mchod 'bul byas pas shin tu ge/ sprul pa'i mchod rten ting 'dzin sku// byams shing snyoms pa'i kun gyi mgon// thugs rje chen pos bskyod du med// nub byang rgyal po'i mig nad sel// gzugs chen mchod rten brtsigs pa ni// rgyal po d+harma a sho kas// ri gsum rtse gdong lung gsum mdo// ri lung mang po 'dus pa'i rgyun// pho brang btab pas bstun nad zin// rmi lam 'byung zhing mchod rten bzhengs// nad las thar te rgyal srid 'dzin// tha chung sras grongs phung po bsregs// tsha tshwa btab cing mchod rten bzhengs// dgra bcom 'bras bu thob par gyur// sras 'bring nad kyis zin de 'das// bdun tshigs bdun gyis rigs drug drangs// thal ba tsha tsha btab nas ni// bla na med pa'i byang chub thob// li tsa bi yis mi shes sam// de nas li tsa bi dgyes nas// da ltar shar gyi phyag rdor khyod// dus der bzhugs pa ngas ma mthong// bag chags sol la gsang bar shod// ces gsungs so// sku gdung 'bar ba mchod rten gyi rgyud las/ mchod rten byung tshul lo rgyus kyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas gsang ba'i bdag pos dam pa'i rigs can rnam pa lnga la thun mong mchod rten gyi man ngag 'di dag gsungs so// mchod rten bya ba'i sa btsal ba// snum zhing 'bol la mnyes pa'i sar// yungs kar dag la sngags 'di yis// lan bdun brjod la mtshams bcad do// oM a mr-i ta ha na ha na hUM phaT/ seng lding lcags phur sor brgyad la// rdo rje phur par bsams nas ni// lan bdun sngags brjod dbus dang ni// gra bzhir btab la gzhag par bya// oM badzra kI la ya sa rba duSh+tAM hUM phaT/ de nas thig skud rin chen la// rdo rje skud par rab bsam nas// rgya khyon cir na thig gis bskor// sngags 'di lan ni gsum brjod pas// sa gzhi rin chen gyur par bsam// oM badzra sU tra hUM phaT/ oM badzra kha na kha na hUM phaT/ des ni rdo rjes bsam pa yi// lag chas sa ni rko ba'i sngags// tshar nas gnas gtsang phyin nas ni// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i phyag rgya ni// rdo rje rtse gsum mnan nas ni// lan bdun sngags bzlas tho bas brdung// oM badzra mung+ga ra a ko Ta ya a ko Ta ya hUM phaT/ tsan+dan gur gum dri chab chus// 'jim pa sbrus byas lan bdun brjod// oM a mr-i te hUM phaT/ a dkar bdud rtsi'i chu ru dmigs// chu de gtor la 'jim pa brdzi// sngags 'di lan bdun gtor bar bya// oM shud+d+he bi sho d+ha nA ya swA hA/ de nas 'jim pa brdzi ba'i dus/ de nyid rdo rje rin chen bsam// oM badzra pra mar ta na ye hUM phaTaswA hA/ de nas 'jim pa'i gong bu la// sngags 'di gsum brjod byin brlabs pas// 'od lngas don mdzad 'phros 'dus nas// rin

chen lngar ni gyur par bsam// oM na maHsa man bud+d+hA nAn/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAn/ oM badzra A yu She swA hA/ de nas 'jim pa byin rlabs kyi// sngags 'di nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas// mchod rten gcig byas tsam gyis ni// bye ba byas par 'gyur ba'o// oM na mo b+ha ga wA te be ro tsa na pra b+ha rA dzA ya/ ar ha te saM myag saM bud+d+hA ya/ oM sUk+Sh+me sa me sa ma ye/ sa ma te sa ma ro se/ a na pa ra ne ta ra ma pe ya sho/ ma hA te dzo rA dza ku le ni rbA ni/ sarba ta thA ga to hr-i da ya/ a d+hiSh+ThA na a d+hiSh+ThI te swA hA/ rigs lnga so so'i sngags gzhug gam// yi dam sngags sam gang byed sngags// bris te tsha tsha'i nang du gzhug/ gro gar gur gum dag gis bri// oM d+ha ra d+ha ra ya d+ha ra ya badzra d+h+rig/ oM sha shwa ta pa re sha shwa to e h+ye ni dzi na dzig/ oM badzra sUr+ya ta tra mo/ bam d+ha ma na ma sa ma ya twa ma a haM rat+na d+h+r-ig/ oM badzra d+harma sa ma ya hUM lu hUM lu a ro l-ika/ oM phu phu hi hi d+ha ra d+ha ra pra dz+nyA d+h+r-ig/ yang na sngags thung 'di bris te/ tsha tshwa chung ngu'i nang du gzug/ oM tri ya d+hI kA nI/ sarba ta thA ga tA nAn/ tad+ya thA/ oM sUk+Sh+me sUk+Sh+me/ shAn+te shAn+te/ dAn+te dAn+te/ ni ra ku le/ ya sho ya sho/ te dzo ba ti/ sarba bud+d+ha/ a d+hiSh+Thi te swA hA/ de nas 'bi 'bi gzhug pa'i sngags// gsum brjod thabs dang shes rab 'brel pa yi// chos dbyings nyid du grub par bsam// de yi sngags ni 'di yin no// oM a mr-i tA yu she swA hA/ de nas 'bi 'bi bya ba'i sngags// ma zin bar du brjod par bya// oM trai yat+te sarba ta thA ga to hr-i da ha ya/ gar+b+he dz+wa la/ d+harma d+hA tu gar+b+he sang ha ra na/ A yu na saM sho d+ha ya pA bam/ sarba ta thA ga ta sa man+to bi ma la bi shud+d+he swA hA/ mar dang nyung rtsi 'bul ba'i sngags// nyon mongs rdul bral byang chub bsam// oM a ra dze bi ra dze swA hA/ rkol phor nang du gzhug pa'i sngags// thabs dang shes rab 'brel pa chos dbyings bzhugs// oM d+hA tu gar+b+he swA hA/ rkol phor sa la brdab pa'i sngags// mchod rten grub pas 'gro don bsam// oM d+ha ra ma ra te badzra mud ga ra a ko Ta ya hUM/ de nas mchod rten dbyung ba'i sngags// shel sgong dag pa lta bur bsam// oM badzra d+ha rod pra ba ya swA hA/ rgyu yi chos rnams rdzogs pa la// gzugs kyi sku ni rnam pa gnyis// 'bras bu'i chos rnams rdzogs pa las// chos kyi sku ru byin gyis brlabs// oM sarba ta thA ga ta nirma kA ya sa ma ya s+t+waM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta saM b+ho ga kA ya sa ma ya s+t+waM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta d+harma kA ya ma hA su kha badzra su ta sa ma ya s+t+waM/ de nas srog shing gzug pas ni// mi nub brtan par gyur par bsam// oM badz+wa A yu she swA hA/ 'khor lo bcu gsum gzug pas ni// sa ni bcu gsum gyur pa'o// oM bra mar+d+ha nA ya swA hA/ dar gyi cod pan btags pa yis// thabs dang shes rab ldan par bya// oM pa ta ka

lam pa swA hA/ ba dan sna tshogs 'phyar ba yis// sems can chos kyi snyan pa sgrogs// oM pa ta ka swA hA/ chu srin rgyal mtshan btsugs pa yis// bdud bzhi las rgyal 'khor ba 'dzin// oM kum b+hi ra rA dza swA hA/ gdugs kyi sems can ma lus kun// bla na med pa'i skyabs dang ldan// oM pra ha ma ta nA ya swA hA// me tog phreng ba bcings pa yis// sems can mi brjed gzungs rnams 'dzin// oM rat+na mA le traM hUM/ mtshan dang dpe byad rab ldan pas// blta bas mi ngoms ldan pa'i sngags// na ma s+t+rai ya te d+ha nu ga te/ pra ti ta shru sa ge ta be ta/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samya ka saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA puSh+thi swA hA/ gdan rnams ma lus dbul ba'i sngags// rin chen nyi zla sems can pad// oM sun+d+ha ri dza ya swA hA/ gzhal yas khang du gshegs pa'i sngags// oM da ra da ra ku ta ka ra dza ye swA hA/ rin chen gzhal yas chos kyi pho brang du// nyi zla rin chen gdan la bzhugs su gsol// oM su pra tiSh+Tha badzra ye swA hA/ de la dbang rnams ma lus pa// rdzogs par bskur te gnas par bya'o// oM badzra d+hA tu shwa ri a d+hiSh+ThI te a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAm/ sku dang gsung thugs yon tan las// phrin las rdo rje nyid gyur bsam// oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya wak+ka tsit+ta ma hA sa ma ya s+t+waM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta gu+u na karma ma hA sa ma ya s+t+waM/ de nas mchod pa sna tshogs rnams// mnyes par ma lus dbul bar bya// oM badzra a mr-i te ar+g+ham pra tIts+tsha swA hA/ oM badzra d+hU pe swA hA/ oM badzra puSh+pe swA hA/ oM badzra Alo ke swA hA/ oM badzra gan+d+he swA hA/ oM ba lin+ta te dzo ba lin ta swA hA/ zhes gsungs so// sku gdung 'bar ba mchod rten gyi rgyud las// mchod rten gdab thabs man ngag gi le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i bdag pos thun mong gi mchod rten las kyi rim pa 'di dag gsungs so// chos dbyings mngon gyur ye shes sku brnyes shing// sku gsung thugs kyis 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa// thugs rje'i ci 'dul yid bzhin re skong ba'i// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas ma lus gshegs su gsol// nyon mongs dug sel yon tan 'byung ba'i gnas// gsung rab bcu gnyis 'phags lam rgyal ba'i bka'// bcom ldan shes rab pha rol phyin la sogs// rnam dag dbyings kyi dam chos gshegs su gsol// chos sku gzugs brnyan byang chub sems kyi ngang// gling bzhi 'dul mdzad mchod rten chen po brgyad// bsod nams zhing dang 'gro ba 'dren pa'i gtso// sku gdung ring bsrel ma lus gshegs su gsol// sa bcu rgyal sras che la mnga' brnyes shing// byams dang snying rjes brtson 'grus go bgos nas// shes rab thabs kyis 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa// byang chub sems dpa' ma lus gshegs

su gsol// bden bzhi'i don rtogs log lta'i skyon spangs shing// tshul khrims dri med dug lnga'i skyon bsal nas// 'phags lam don brtson yon tan rgyan mnga' ba// dgra bcom rang rgyal ma lus gshegs su gsol// byang chub sems ldan bde bar gshegs pa'i 'khor/ khams gsum sa drug gnas la mnga' mdzad pa// bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa srung mdzad pa// srid gsum srung ma'i tshogs gyur gshegs su gsol// zhes spyir spyan drang bar gsungs so// chos dbyings rnam dag bzang mo'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// nyon mongs ma gos nam mkha'i rang bzhin la// rtogs pa'i ting 'dzin chags pa'i skur bstan nas// chos sku zab mo'i mchod rten gshegs su gsol// byams pa chen po dpag tshad med pa'i chos// gdug pa'i tshogs rnams thams cad 'dul slad du// me long lta bu chos kyi don rtogs nas// rdo rje brtsegs pa'i mchod rten gshegs su gsol// dga' rab don phyir 'khrul pa kun spangs shing// 'jigs med rin chen bang rim brtsegs pa la// sprul pa'i yon tan tshogs kyi phreng bas brgyan// rin chen brtsegs pa'i mchod rten gshegs su gsol// nyon mongs skyon bral pad+ma'i gdan steng na// dga' ba brtsegs pa'i bang rim bdud bzhi 'joms// bum pa chos dbyings spros pa med pa'i dbyings// pad+ma brtsegs pa'i mchod rten gshegs su gsol// nyon mongs 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las kyis sbyangs// rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan ma kun bcom nas// bsod nams dge tshul bsags pa'i mchod rten brtsegs// byang chub rdzogs pa'i mchod rten gshegs su gsol// shAkya thub pa sprul pa'i sangs rgyas kyis// sku yi 'od zer sprul pas sgrib pa sbyong// yon tan tshogs kyi cha las skur brten pa// 'od 'byung sprul pa'i mchod rten gshegs su gsol// byang chub tshogs kyis rab tu brgyan pa'i sku// 'dzam gling kun nas bsod nams sprin tshogs 'du// bkra shis dge ba bsod nams tshogs bsags shing// mi mthun sgrib pa'i bag chags bsal ba'i phyir// bkra shis brtsegs pa'i mchod rten gshegs su gsol// dge tshul bsod nams mchod rten gshegs su gsol// yon tan tshogs kyi mchod rten gshegs su gsol// nyon mongs mun sel mar me gshegs su gsol// zhes so so'i spyan drang bar gsungs so// de nas bzhugs su gsol ba gsungs// 'ja' tshon spel legs bkod 'dra ba'i// dge bcu dag pa'i pad+ma'i gdan steng du// rim bzhin 'tshams par bzhugs su gsol// chos dbyings pho brang rin chen gzhal yas 'dir// 'ja' tshon spel 'dra'i gdan bzang bting lags kyi// bla med yid dang rang bzhin mchod rten dang// [(]15[)]

sprul pa'i gzugs can ma lus mchod rten kun// dog cing tshor ba mi mnga' bar// sku gsung rdo rje lta bur byin brlabs nas// 'gro ba sems can rnams la sman slad du// brtan par bzhugs nas thugs rjes dgongs su gsol// de nas phyag 'tshal rim pa gsungs// chos sku mkha' la ye shes dkar bkram zhing// thugs rje'i phrin las gzugs sku'i char 'bebs pa// 'khor ba'i mun sel bdud bzhi 'joms mdzad pa// dus gsum bde gshegs rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// dmigs med chags bral bdud rtsi 'dus ma byas// rgyu 'bras bstan dang lam dang gnyen po'i chos// sdug bsngal zad mdzad srid pa'i mun sel ba// dam chos bdud rtsi rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan shAkya seng ge'i byin rlabs las// srid rtse rin chen sna lnga'i gzhal yas na// rigs bzhi'i phyag rgya mchod rten bzhir snang ba// 'gro don rdzogs par mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// ji ltar u dum wA ra'i me tog ltar// bde gshegs mdzad pa mthar phyin grub pa'i rtags// 'khor ba zad mdzad thar lam 'dren pa'i gtso// bla med mchod rten brgyad la phyag 'tshal lo// rnam dag dbyings kyi byin brlabs rgyal ba'i gdung// ma rig mun sel nges par legs pa'i gzhi// sprul pa'i mchod rten srid pas bkur ba'i gnas// ring bsrel 'jig rten rgyan la phyag 'tshal lo// thabs mkhas thugs rjes 'gro ba'i don mdzad cing// bden gnyis don rtogs sa bcu mchog brnyes shing// gzhan don rnam par grol ba'i sku mnga' ba// byang chub sems dpa' rnam la phyag 'tshal lo// nyon mongs dug spangs tshul khrims rgyan mnga' zhing// slob dang mi slob 'phags lam don bsgoms te// rig pa gsum gyi mtshan ma'i dgra bcom pa// nyan thos rang rgyal rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// srid pa gsum gyi bdag po'i gzugs 'dzin cing// lha klu gnod sbyin bdag por zhal 'ches pa'i// rnam bzhi 'khor du gtogs la phyag 'tshal lo// shar phyogs mngon dga'i sangs rgyas zhing khams na// rdo rje ri bo lhun po'i mchod rten bzhugs// 'od zer 'bar ba nyi ma stong gi gzi// sangs rgyas rdo rje'i 'khor la phyag 'tshal lo// lho phyogs dpal ldan yid bzhin zhing khams na// rin chen ri bo lhun po'i mchod rten bzhugs// 'od zer 'bar ba nyi ma stong gi gzi// sangs rgyas rin chen 'khor la phyag 'tshal lo// nub phyogs bde ldan dga' ba'i zhing khams na// pad+ma ri bo lhun po'i mchod rten bzhugs// 'od zer 'bar ba nyi ma stong gi gzi// sangs rgyas pad+ma'i 'khor la phyag 'tshal lo// byang phyogs rnam par dag pa'i zhing khams na// las kyi ri bo lhun po'i mchod rten bzhugs// 'od zer 'bar ba nyi ma stong gi gzi// sangs rgyas

don grub 'khor la phyag 'tshal lo// sngar 'das rgyal ba'i ring srel yum gyi dbyings// 'gro don lhun grub bsod nams dbyings kyi gtso// mtshan ma med las mtshan ma'i skur yang gsal// sangs rgyas rab bdun da ltar bstan pa'i skur// 'khor lo bdun te phyag rgya'i mtshan mar gsal// log par dad sel gser thub 'khor ba 'jigs// thams cad skyobs dang 'od srungs mar me mdzad// shAkya thub pa la sogs sangs rgyas sku// 'gro don lhun grub mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// rtsing po'i blo yis mchod rten 'dzin pa yang// nges par mkhyen pa'i khyad par ka Ni ka/ 'jig rten ye shes mun sel zla ltar gsal// 'di lta'i rmad mchog dam pa chos kyi dbyings// de phyir bla na med pa'i mchod rten la// lus rab btud de sri zhus bdag phyag 'tshal// dang ba'i yid kyis dmigs te mchod pa 'bul// 'di dag thugs rjes dgongs te shes su gsol// 'gro don yon bdag sems can ma lus rnams// mtho ris bgrod nas sangs rgyas 'grub par shog/ de nas mchod pa 'bul ba gsungs// ye shes tshogs rdzogs sku gsum lhun gyis grub// bzhi bcom drug ldan mi gnas mya ngan 'das// thugs rje sprul pas 'khor ba'i 'dam skems pa'i// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams la mchod pa 'bul// ye shes nyi mas ma rig mun sel ba'i// dri med bdud rtsis 'khor ba'i nad rnams 'joms// don dam dmigs med bde bar gshegs pa'i gnas// 'phags pa'i lam gyur chos la mchod pa 'bul// byams dang snying rje dga' dang btang snyoms tshul// bde gshegs rdor rin pad+mo las kyi rtags// rin chen bzhi las mngon du gyur pa'i sku// rigs bzhi mchod rten rnams la mchod pa 'bul// lho phyogs 'dzam gling rin chen dkyil 'khor 'dir// ye shes dpag yas thugs rjes 'brel ba'i sku// rang byung sprul pa'i mchod rten chen po dang// yid bzhin lhun gyis grub la mchod pa 'bul// nub phyogs bde ldan pad+mo'i dkyil 'khor na// thabs kyi bye brag ring bsrel skur bstan pa// dpe rnams bsam las 'das pa'i mchod rten dang// rmad grags chos kyi dbyings la mchod pa 'bul// byang phyogs dpag yas yid bzhin dkyil 'khor na// thams cad dga' byed dpal zhing chos kyi gdung// yon tan rin chen brtsegs pa'i mchod rten dang/ khams gsum bde rgyas sgron la mchod pa 'bul// shar gyi lus 'phags ye shes dkyil 'khor na// byams pas 'khor ba 'dren mdzad ring bsrel sku// byams ldan bsod nams gter gyi mchod rten dang// mthar legs g.yung drung rdzogs la mchod pa 'bul/ khri 'phang dang por dran pa nyer gzhag bzhi// lus dran sems dran

chos dran rjes su dran// spyi dang rang gi mtshan nyid mngon rtogs pa'i// rig pa shes rab mkhyen la mchod pa 'bul// bang rim gnyis par yang dag spong ba bzhi// sdig rnams mi bskyed dge ba'i chos spel zhing// dge ba'i chos bskyed chos don rdzogs mdzad pa// rtog pa'i bag chags bral la mchod pa 'bul// bang rim gsum par rdzu 'phrul rkang pa bzhi// 'dun dang sems dang dpyod dang brtson 'grus rnams// spong ba'i 'du byed ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis// thogs med 'gro don mdzad la mchod pa 'bul// bang rim bzhi par snang ba dbang po lnga// dad brtson dran dang ting 'dzin dbang po dang// shes rab dbang pos chos la dbang bsgyur nas// 'dod dgu dge rtsa spyod la mchod pa 'bul// 'gyur med bum rten 'degs pa'i stobs lnga ste// dad dang brtson 'grus dran dang ting 'dzin stobs// shes rab stobs kyis nyon mongs zil gyis gnon// mthu dbang mngon du gyur la mchod pa 'bul// bum par mngon 'phags byang chub yan lag bdun// dran dang tshor byed brtson 'grus dga' ba dang// shin tu sbyangs dang ting 'dzin btang snyoms kyis// 'grub 'gyur thogs pa med la mchod pa 'bul/ kha khyer 'phags pa'i lam gyi yan lag brgyad// lta dang rtogs dang ngag dang las kyi mtha'// 'tsho dang rtsol dang dran dang ting 'dzin gyis// 'phags lam gnas rab 'jug la mchod pa 'bul// srog shing mkhyen pa bcu yi bdag nyid de// thabs dang shes rab rig pa'i rtsal mchog gis// dam chos bdud rtsi 'dzin la srog tu gyur// shes rab don kun rig la mchod pa 'bul// 'khor lo bcu gsum stobs bcu nyer gzhag gsal// shes rab spyan ldan thams cad mngon gzigs pa'i// shes bya'i bag chags sbyong la thogs pa med// ye shes phun sum tshogs la mchod pa 'bul// char khebs skyabs chen thugs rje'i bdag nyid de// 'dul ba'i dus dang sems can rgyud mkhyen rnams// 'jig rten rnams la phan 'dogs rab brtson pa'i// phyi mthar yun ring bzhugs la mchod pa 'bul// dad brtson shugs kyis lus ngag sems btud de// brtson 'grus drag pos rin chen sna lnga dang// 'byung ba lnga las grub pa'i mchod rten sogs// sku gdung ring bsrel rnams la mchod pa 'bul// sku gsung thugs las sprul pa'i rgyal ba'i sras// thugs rje'i shugs kyis phyi mtha' gzhan don mdzad// skye 'gag med pa'i don gyi blo sbyangs la// byang chub sems dpa' rnams la mchod pa 'bul// rnam grol thar lam mchog tu rab brtson pa// zung bzhi ya brgyad rig pa'i skyes bu'i tshogs// rten cing 'brel pa rig pa'i sangs rgyas pas// 'phags pa'i dge 'dun rnams la mchod pa 'bul// dge

ba bcu bskyed skal ldan sangs rgyas zhing// tshangs pa'i skal gyis ngan song mthar spangs te// rdzu 'phrul shugs kyis 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa// 'jig rten srung ma'i tshogs la mchod pa 'bul// rdo rings them skas chu srin rgyal mtshan dang// gdugs dang ba dan dar gyi cod pan dang// pad+ma nyi zla sil snyan lha yi rdzas// tshangs pa'i dbyangs ldan dmigs pa dag pas mchod// ting 'dzin sngags dang phyag rgya'i mthu gyur pa'o// yon chab bdug spos me tog mar me dang// bshos gsang dri chab la sogs sbyar ba dag/ mchod yon rnam lnga'i tshogs kyi mchod pa 'bul// dngos su 'byor dang yid kyis rnam sprul pa'i// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten grub pa'i rdzas// kun bzang rnam dag mchod pa'i sprin phung gis// nam mkha' gang bar dmigs te mchod pa 'bul// 'jig rten 'khor ba'i gnas nas drang ba dang// 'gro don mdzad pa'i thugs dam bskang slad du// ye shes nyi mas mtshan ma'i skyon spangs nas// byams pa'i thugs rjes mchod pa bzhes su gsol// rgyal ba 'khor bcas ring bsrel mchod 'os rnams// spyan drangs phyag 'tshal mchod cing bkur ba'i mthus// sngon bsags lam gyi sgrib pa kun sbyangs nas// 'gro drug tshogs rnams mngon par sangs rgyas shig/ de nas ar+g+ha'i gsol mchod bshad// mchod rten sku yi cha lugs ni// 'og gi rmang bting ye shes bzhi// gyen du khri 'phang rnam thar gsum// chags med pad+ma'i gdan steng na// bum pa bzang po chos kyi rje// gser gyi bre phul 'od zer 'phro// srog shing drang srong bla na med// 'khor lo bzhi dang ye shes brgyad// 'bar ba me dpung rdo rjes bskor// bkra shis dpal tshogs gzhal yas 'dir// bla med mchod pa'i gdan bshams shing// chu bo gang+gA'i rgyun bzhin du// ar+g+ha'i rgyun yang mi 'chad de// bkra shis mchod pa 'di 'bul na// thugs rjes dgongs nas bzhes su gsol// mchod rten gsung gi cha lugs ni// man ngag tshig gi snying po brjod// bzlas brjod gsung rab bcu gnyis brjod// don dam sgra skad kun la mkhas// rgyal ba rgya mtsho 'khor dang bcas// gsung gi mchod rten thams cad la// bkra shis dpal tshogs gzhal yas 'dir// bla med mchod pa'i rgyan bshams nas// chu bo gang+gA'i rgyun bzhin du// ar+g+ha'i rgyun yang mi 'chad de// bkra shis mchod pa 'di 'bul na// thugs rjes dgongs nas bzhes su gsol// mchod rten thugs kyi cha lugs ni// dpe med bsam 'das nam mkha' che// ting 'dzin nyid las cir yang gsal// ye shes nyid yin cir yang rtogs// shes rab nyid dpal mkhyen rab gsal// thams cad mkhyen

pas lhun gyis grub// don dam sems rtog yid las 'das// bkra shis dpal tshogs gzhal yas 'dir// bla med mchod pa'i rgyan bshams nas// chu bo gang+gA'i rgyun bzhin du// ar+g+ha'i rgyun yang mi 'chad de// bkra shis mchod pa 'di 'bul na// thugs rjes dgongs la bzhes su gsol// bla med mchod rten cha lugs ni// rin chen 'bar ba'i srid rtse ni// tsin+ta ma Ni ye shes bzhi// bkra shis dpal tshogs gzhal yas 'dir// bla med mchod pa'i rgyan bshams shing// chu bo gang+gA'i rgyun bzhin du// ar+g+ha'i rgyun yang mi 'chad de// bkra shis mchod pa 'di 'bul na// thugs rjes dgongs te bzhes su gsol// yid kyi mchod rten cha lugs ni// nam mkha'i dbyings dang rgya mtsho'i 'jing// byang chub sems kyi mchod rten bris// snang zhing stong la stong zhing gsal// yid kyi mchod rten thams cad la// bkra shis dpal tshogs gzhal yas na// bla med mchod pa'i rgyan bshams shing// chu bo gang+gA'i rgyun bzhin du// ar+g+ha'i rgyun yang mi 'chad de// bkra shis mchod pa 'di 'bul na// thugs rjes dgongs nas bzhes su gsol// rang bzhin mchod rten cha lugs ni// thugs rje'i byin rlabs rmad po che// mtshan ma'i sdug bsngal rab bsal nas// sems can kun la byams thugs ldan// bkra shis dpal tshogs gzhal yas 'dir// bla med mchod pa'i rgyan bshams nas// chu bo gang+gA'i rgyud bzhin du// ar+g+ha'i rgyun yang mi 'chad de// bkra shis mchod pa 'di 'bul na// thugs rjes dgongs nas bzhes su gsol// sprul pa'i mchod rten ting 'dzin sku// byams shing snyems pas kun gyi mgon// thugs rje chen pos skyo dub med// nub byang rgyal po'i mig nas sel// sprul pa'i mchod rten thams cad la// bkra shis dpal tshogs gzhal yas 'dir// bla med mchod pa'i rgyan bshams shing// chu bo gang+gA'i rgyun bzhin du// ar+g+ha'i rgyun yang mi 'chad de// bkra shis mchod pa 'di 'bul na// thugs rjes dgongs nas bzhengs su gsol// gzugs 'dzin mchod rten shes rab sku// bdud kyi 'khor dang gshin rje'i 'khor// srin po'i tshogs dang lha ma yin// gnod sbyin ma lus thams cad kyi// gzi byin mthu stobs 'phrog mdzad pa'i// gnod sbyin srin po'i rgyu srang gcod// gzugs chen mchod rten thams cad la// bkra shis dpal tshogs gzhal yas 'dir// bla med mchod pa'i rgyan bshams shing// chu bo gang+gA'i rgyun bzhin du// ar+g+ha'i rgyun yang mi 'chad de// bkra shis mchod pa 'di 'bul na// thugs rjes dgongs nas bzhes su gsol// de nas mchod rten bstod pa gsungs// bla med mchod rten bstod pa ni// tshogs chen rdzogs pa chos kyi sku// bla med byang chub thugs rje'i

gnas/ khams gsum 'gro rnams don gyi phyir// ye shes gzugs sprul mchod rten 'di// gzhi rmang dge bcu pad+ma dag pas 'jam// dran pa nyer gzhag rmang gi khri 'phang brtan// sdig pa spangs pa'i bang rim gnyis pa las// rdzu 'phrul rkang pa bang rim gsum pa ste// rnam grol dbang po bang rim bzhi pa bzang// thugs rje'i tshad med chos kyi char khebs lding// bden bzhi'i bstan pa 'jig rten skyong bzhis btsugs// stobs lnga'i bum pa'i dbyings sdug kun tu zlum// byang chub yan lag pad+ma shin tu mdzes// ting 'dzin bslabs pas gang tshe brai legs pa// 'phags lam bre legs gru bzhi rim pas sdug/ shes bcu srog shing gzhung tshugs med par drang// stobs bcu'i 'phang lo gshib pas sgrib pa spangs// bla med brnyes pa'i gdugs mchog mkha' la 'phags// yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub cod pan ldem// ma 'dres nyer gzhag gdugs kyis rnam par mtho// dbyangs rab yan lag gsung snyan dril bu 'khrol// chos 'khor bskor ba'i gsar bye'u ba dan 'phur// mi 'jigs bag skyong rdo rings seng ge brjid// thabs ldan sprul pas skye bo 'dul bar mdzad// rdzogs pa chen po'i tshul du lham me ba// byang chub snying po'i rten la phyag 'tshal bstod// yid kyi mchod rten bstod pa ni// 'khor ldog med pa'i gnas dang spyod yul ni// nam mkha' sa gzhi la ni gzhi blangs te// ye shes bzhi yi khri 'phang bzhi ni brtsigs// mtshan med bum rten la ni gzhi blangs te// chos dbyings mkha' las 'phags pa'i bum pa bgyis// dpag tu med pa'i srog shing legs btsugs nas// pha rol phyin bcu'i 'khor lo legs btags nas// mtha' gnyis bum pa'i gdugs ni yas 'bubs la// mnyam nyid dar dpyangs kyis ni rab brgyan te// mtha' dang dbus med mi dmigs mi rtog pa// ma bcos lhun grub gnas pa'i chos kyi sku// skyon bral yang dag nyid la phyag 'tshal bstod// rang bzhin mchod rten la bstod pa ni/ yid bzhin lhun grub bkra shis gzhal yas khang// chags med ye nas dag pa chos kyi dbyings// srid gsum mi 'khor mchod rten ka ni ka/ gzhi yi rmang bting ya mtshan rdo rje brag/ gyen du khri 'phang khyad par dkon mchog gsum// ha 'dab dmar smug 'khyil cing ldem pa la// shel gyi bum pa dri med rnam par dag/ gser gyi bre phul yangs pas chos kyi dbyings// srog shing ma skyes sems kyi ngo bo nyid// ma 'khor ma byung chos kyi dbyings dang 'dra// rma bya chen mo yid 'ong gzugs sgra sgrogs// stong zhing gsal ba'i me long 'od po che// sku gsum dbyer med byams snyoms kun gyi mgon// mi g.yo mnyam nyid chos mchog dpe las

'phags// sku gsung thugs kyi chos tshul rab kyi dbyings// rin chen sangs rgyas sku mchog mngon bstan nas// thugs rjes sprul pas 'od zer spyi gtsug rdzogs// las dang nyon mongs sdug bsngal zhi mdzad pa/ khams gsum mi ldog g.yung drung byang chub mkhar// dgra bcom ba gam bzhi po spyi rdzogs yangs// ye shes glo skar thabs kyi mda' 'phangs pas// 'chi bdag gshin rje ma rig sems can gcod// bsam gtan skyogs sgo yangs pas srid pa'i 'khor rnams 'joms// lcog dmar dpe med srid gsum rtse las yang dag 'phags// mda' yab rtag par rdo rje me ltar 'bar// dbyar zhing sa brlan drod gsher zil mi 'go/ dgun zhing sprin phung rlung 'tshubs rdul mi 'go/ gnyan te klu rgyal chen po sbrul mi 'khri// gzar te ha lu man+tha spre'u mi 'dzeg/ ye shes mchod rten chos dbyings rnam dag sku// de bzhin nyid kyi sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// sprul pa'i mchod rten la bstod pa/ bla med ye shes srid gsum mun sel ba// kun la sgrib pa mi mnga' thugs rje dpal ldan pa// skye dgu rnams la sman slad rgyal ba'i ring bsrel snod// chos skur byin gyis brlabs nas mchod rten tshul bstan pa// rnam par 'gro ba'i rigs ldan sa gzhi lta bu la// byang chub sems mchog rdo rje gdan bsgrubs te// chos la dran pa nyer gzhag bang rim ni// sdug bsngal tshogs las yid byung lam gyi thog mar bshad// bang rim gnyis pa nyon mongs yang dag spong ba bzhi// mi dge chos rnams rab sdom rnal 'byor rten yang byed// bang rim gsum pa ting 'dzin rdzu 'phrul rkang pa ste// sems kyi tha ba 'dul zhing bzod pa'i mchog tu gyur// bang rim bzhi pa bsam gtan dbang po lnga rnams ni// mthong ba'i lam gyi gnas yin de nyid stobs thob pa// bum rten khyad par tshul grub 'jig rten ches mchog ste// thar pa'i rgyu mtshan dam pa de las lhag pa med// bum pa byang chub yan lag dbyibs sdug snying po'i don// shin tu spras pa med phyir kun nas zlum po gnas// de la brten pa'i 'phags pa'i yan lag lam rnams ni// bre legs zur phyin lta bur yon tan rdzogs par snang// srog shing dpag bsam ye shes smon lam chen po yin// shin tu brten par gnas pa rmad byung chos kyi sku// 'khor lo rim par brtsegs legs shes bcu'i rim gsum ste// ma 'dres bco brgyad chos kyang de 'dra'i tshul du snang// rnam thar brgyad kyis zur bsam rin chen mgur chu bzang// phan 'dogs skyon ma mchis pas nyon mongs med pa'i tshul// rnam grol shes rab ye shes 'od ldan gzugs kun zil gnon pa// bla med yon tan rgyan gcig chos sku bzang la 'os// steng gi rin chen gdugs mdzes rnam kun

mkhyen pa'i mchog/ bsnyel ba med pa'i rgyus bzung thugs rje khyad par byung// de phyir yang dag rim bzhin dam chos sgra sgrogs pa// mi shes gnyid las sad mdzad yan lag bcu gnyis ldan// nor bu'i phreng ba spel legs pha rol phyin bcu ste// 'jig rten 'das pa'i dpal dang bkra shis kun mnga'i zhing// sa steng gdugs kyis skyabs ltar tshad med bzhis khyab pa// rgyal ba mi rnams la yang dgongs pa mnyam par 'gyur// yid bzhin nor bu'i 'od 'bar mngon par mkhyen pa drug/ 'khor ba'i mnga' la rtag gsal kun tu snang mdzad pa// mi 'gyur kha lo sgyur mchog tshogs chen yongs rdzogs phyir// dam chos rgyal por mnga' gsol gser gyi cod pan 'phur// byang chub sems kyi zla tshes dkar po'i chos rgyu dang// ye shes chen po'i me long dus gsum sgrib med dag/ rgyu 'bras bzang por 'brel pas bstan pa yongs kyi dbus gnas pa// 'gro ba'i skyon rnams sel la phyag 'tshal bstod// rgyal chen phyogs bzhir bkod pa snyems pa mi mnga'i tshul// bsrung med stobs bcu'i rtsal yangs brjid pa seng ge ste// rgyal bas bdud kyi tshogs btul mkhyen ldan pa'i// ye shes lhun gyis grub la phyag 'tshal bstod// theg gsum thar pa'i skas btsugs rnam thar sgo ldan pa// so so'i dbang po rim bzhin bsgral nas kyang// byang chub chen po'i gdung rgyud 'phel mdzad pa// spyan mnga' rnam par sbyangs la phyag 'tshal bstod// rang bzhin bzod mthar rnam dag de bzhin nyid// spros pa'i dri mas ma gos dkar ba'i tshul gcig kyang// rin chen rnam par spras pa'i mtshan mchog rdzogs pa'i sku// 'gro don lhag par mdzad la phyag 'tshal bstod// bde gshegs sku gdung dbyibs bcas chos sku rnam par dag/ gang gis mthong thos dran gus mchod cing reg pas kyang// mtho ris nges dpal thar mchog bde thob pas// yon tan rmad byung tshogs mnga' khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// bsam gyis mi khyab gnas te brjod par mi nus bzhin// dad pas 'ol byi cha shas gus par bstod pa la// don med sku rmongs 'phang smad nongs par gyur to 'tshal// bde gshegs mngon sum spyan la nongs skur shin tu bshad// yon tan rgya mtsho mnga' las gal te thigs tsam zhig/ don dang tshig gi sgo nas tshul 'dra brjod zhe na// dge ba bzang po de ni bdag gi gter chen de// skye dgu mgron du gnyen phyir byang chub mchog tu bsngo// zhes ni phyi rabs 'byung rnams lung bstan to// de 'dra'i tshul du shes rab kyis gus pas bstod do// gzugs chen mchod rten la bstod pa// bcom ldan shAkya seng ge'i ring bsrel snod// srid gsum mchod gnas bla med yul gyi rgyan

bzhugs pa/ 'od bzang 'tsher bas shel gyi dkar po bzhin du sba// gzi chen lham me lhan ne lhag ge phyogs bcu gar yang gsal// bkra shis byin chags rgyang rings su mthong yang// sdig sbyangs dpal bskyed yid 'ong spro kun bde ba thob// mthu chen gnyan pos yul ljaungs stong khams byin chags shing// lha mi 'jig rten gsum gyi mgon skyabs rten gyi mchog/ ye shes tshogs chen rgyas pas bde gshegs chos kyi sku// rnam rtog mtha' dang bral bas yon tan kun gyi gzhi// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rmang gi khri 'phang dang po brtan// brtson 'grus gang dag spros pa'i khri 'phang gnyis pa legs// ting 'dzin rdzu 'phrul rkang pa'i khri 'phang gsum pa dge/ rnam grol dbang po lnga yi khri 'phang bzhi pa brjid// bum rten stobs lnga bum pa byang chub yan lag bdun// bre legs gru bzhi 'phags pa'i lam gyi yan lag brgyad// srog shing stobs bcu gdugs kyi 'phreng ba bcu// gdugs phreng gsum po ma 'dres dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la// snying rje chen pos 'phags pa'i chos kyi char khebs lding// bla med go 'phang brnyes pa'i gdugs kyi gnas 'phang mtho// 'jig rten mun sel dag pa'i ye shes zla ba gsal// dbyangs snyan tshangs pa'i gsung gi dril bu sgra snyan 'khrol// yang dag rdzaugs pa'i byang chub dar gyi cod pan 'phur// bden bzhi bshad pa'i 'jig rten skyong zhing btsun// rnam dag tshul khrims phung po me tog 'phreng ba bzang// skyon bral bsrung ba med gzhi chos kyi them skas mdzes// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i ba dan dkar po sba// bdud bzhi rgyal mtshan snyel ba'i rtags su chu srin rgyal mtshan grags// mi 'jigs bzhi yi rdo rings seng ges brjid// 'di 'dra'i dam chos ngo mtshar rmad du byung// thabs mkhas thugs rje'i dbang gis mchod rten tshul du sprul// nam mkha'i dbyings nas 'ja' tshon gsal ba ji bzhin du// yon tan blo yi khyad par kha dog dbyibs su sgyur// dpal ldan rin chen 'byung gnas ya mtshan chen po la// dus gsum rgyal ba rnams kyi mchod rten skur byung tshul// dpal 'byung ka ni ka dang ting 'dzin tshul gcig la// bsod nams gzi brjid chen pos yul khams byin brlabs shing// sangs rgyas sprul pa chen po'i mchod rten rnams// phrin las rdzogs par mdzad la phyag 'tshal bstod// de nas sku khrus gsol ba ni// rnam dag skyon bral byang chub sems kyi dbyings// rnam dag skyon bral yon tan tshogs kyi gter// bkra shis bstod cing phyag 'tshal bstod pa'i gnas// bdud bzhi'i dpung rnams rab tu tshar gcod phyir// chos dbyings dag pa'i sku la sku khrus gsol// nyon mongs 'khrul pa'i rtog pa dag gyur cig/ ji ltar me long ngos la

gzugs brnyan snang 'gyur yang// chos kyi sku las rdul tsam g.yos pa med// rin chen sna lngas bsgrubs pa'i mchod rten dang// sa'am chu'am 'on te bar snang la// sems can don du rin chen skur bstan pa// mchod pa dmigs par bcas te sku khrus gsol/ khams gsum gnas pa'i bag chags dag gyur cig/ dad rmang gzhi btsugs rnam dag dbu ma 'jams// dran pa nyer gzhag rmang gi khri 'phang mtho// theg pa rnams kyi bang rim brtsegs pa la// chos dbyings spros med bum pa zlum po ste// smon lam chen po'i ting 'dzin srog shing btsugs// dge ba'i longs spyod nam mkha' gdugs kyis bkang// byang chub sems dpa' zla tshes rnam par dag/ mdo sde bcu gnyis 'khor lo'i phreng bas brgyan// snang dbyings chos kyi sku la sku khrus gsol// shar phyogs byams pa'i 'khor lo sku khrus gsol// zhe sdang gdug pa'i skyon rnams kun bsal nas// rtag tu byams pa'i ting 'dzin thob par shog/ lho phyogs rin chen chos sku brtsegs pa las// nga rgyal gdug pa'i tshogs kun bsal ba'i phyir// byang chub mchog gi chu bos sku khrus gsol/ khams gsum 'khor ba'i nga rgyal skyon bral nas// rtag tu 'dod pa'i yon tan tshogs dang ldan gyur shog/ nub phyogs rnam dag pad+ma byang chub chos kyi dbyings// 'dod chags skyon bral pad+ma'i khri brtsegs na/ khams gsum gnas pa'i bag chags byang bar bya// chos kyi sku la ye shes sku khrus gsol// sems can rnams kyi 'dod chags byang gyur cig/ byang phyogs rnam dag las kyi zhing khams nas// 'dod chags sred spangs yon tan rdzogs par ston/ rin chen in+d+ra lta bu'i mchod rten la// las kyi sgrib pa sbyang phyir sku khrus gsol// sems can rnams kyi 'dod pa 'grub gyur cig/ de nas mchod rten dbang skur ba// rtog pa ye shes dbang mchog gis// dbang mchog dam pa bskur ba ni// srog shing tshugs pa shes pa bcu yi dbang// 'khor lo pha rol phyin pa bcu yi dbang// char khebs thugs rje chen po'i dbang// gdugs ni mtha' gnyis skyob pa'i dbang// rgyal mtshan bdud bzhi las rgyal dbang// ba dan khams gsum ma chags dbang// me tog phreng ba tshul khrims dag pa'i dbang// cod pan khams gsum dbang du sdud pa'i dbang// rin chen sna brgyad rgyud las byas pa'i dbang// sems can ma lus re 'dod skong ba'i dbang// sku mdog mu tig dkar po dri med ltar// gdugs mchog sha ri ram gyi dbang bskur ro// gzugs su snang ba rnam par snang mdzad sogs// phyag rgya chen po'i tshogs kyis dbang bskur ro// ye shes lnga yi 'od zer 'phro// ye shes lnga yi dbang bskur ro// thams cad du yang skye ba med// chos nyid

kun bzang dbang bskur ro// zhes gsungs so// sku gdung 'bar ba mchod rten gyi rgyud las/ thun mong las kyi rim pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i bdag pos khyad par du gdab pa 'di gsungs so// lha nyid sgom dang rgyu byin brlab// gdab cing rab gnas bya ba'o// de nas bdag nyid byin brlab pa// bdag nyid pha ma lta bu'i sems/ khams gsum gnas pa'i sems can rnams// bu yi 'du shes nyer gzhag nas// bsod nams tshogs dang ye shes tshogs// tshogs chen zung la lam sbyang phyir// dngos rnams rang bzhin mi rtogs pas// bdag kyang stong pa nyid du gnas// de bas bdag nyid las kyi lha// rigs lnga zhi khro gang mos su// bskyed la thugs ka ye shes sems// dbang bskur sku gsung thugs byin brlab// spyan drang gzhug cing brtan par bya// de ni bdag nyid bsgom par gsungs// oM AHhUM swA hA/ de ltar gsal ba'i rnal 'byor las// 'byung lnga'i rgyu rnams byin gyis brlabs// phyag rgya khong stong rab sbyar nas// a yis 'byung ba rnam pa lnga// stong nyid ngang las cir yang snang// ye shes sgyu ma gang 'dod gyur// nam mkha' dag la 'debs 'dod na// phyag rgya thal mo khong stong sbyar// gang zhig sa la 'debs pa ni// phyag rgya spyan gyis 'dul byed bya// chu la 'debs na mA ma kI'i// rdo rje bsdams nas mthe'u chung bsgreng// me la 'debs par 'dod pa na// phyag rgya thal mo khong stong las// sor mo me dpung tshul du bya// rlung la 'debs par 'dod pa na// phyag rgya thal mo g.yab par bya// 'byung lnga'i byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags// yum chen rnam pa lnga yi sngags// oM bi ra dza badzra swa hA/ dbyings phyug mas nam mkha' byin gyis brlab pa'o// oM badzra d+hA ri dza a ta ka ra swA hA/ sangs rgyas spyan gyis sa byin gyis brlab pa'o// oM rma ri na ni badzra d+hA ra swA hA/ mA ma kIs chu byin gyis brlab pa'o// oM badzraag+ni gar sha swA hA/ gos dkar mos me byin gyis brlab pa'o// oM badzra a na li a no la pra tsa la mo hUM li t+ya da dar swA hA/ dam tshig sgrol mas rlung byin gyis brlab par bya ba'i sngags so// 'byung ba rnam pa lnga po yang// ye shes rdo rje'i rang bzhin las// cir yang snang du rung bar brlab// bdag nyid lha yi thugs ka nas// raM yaM khaM gi yi ge las// brkos por sbyangs nas gzhal yas khang// nyi zla gdan dang bcas par bsam// gdab lugs rnam pa lngar shes te// yi dam phrin las rten 'brel dang// lha rnams bsgrubs shing tshe 'das sbyang// phyi nang 'byung ba rnam lnga la// g.yon pas phreng ba'i grangs bzung zhing// g.yas pas brkos por btab pa yis// gzhal yas lha dang bcas par bsgom// hUM badzra d+h+r-ig muM d+hA tA+e shwa

rI// oM dzi na dz-ig/ lam dwe sha ra te/ swa rat+na d+h+r-ig/ maM mo ha ra ti/ aM a ro lig pyaM rA ga ra ti/ ha pradz+nyA d+h+r-ig/ taM badzra ra te/ nam mkha' mi bskyod yab yum nyid// sa ni rnam par snang mdzad la// chu ni rin 'byung yab dang yum// me ni snang ba mtha' yas te// rlung ni don grub yab yum la// 'byung lnga rigs lnga sangs rgyas pa'o// gang zhig phrin las sgrub 'dod na// zhi ba rnam par snang mdzad la// rgyas pa rin chen 'byung ldan de// dbang la snang ba mtha' yas la// drag po don yod grub pa'o// yang na bde gshegs he ru ka/ rin chen khrag 'thung pad+ma las// gti mug can ni zhi ba la// nga rgyal che la rgyas pa de// 'dod chags dbang du 'dus pa dang// phrag dog zhe sdang drag por snang// chu rlung rgyu ba zhi ba las// sa rlung rgyu dus rgyas pa grub// me yi rlung gis dbang du 'gyur// rlung gi rlung la drag por snang// srog 'dzin las rnams kun la bsngags// oM shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ oM puSh+tiM ku ru swA hA/ oM ba shang ku ru swA hA/ oM mA ra ya phaT/ 'od dkar bkug nas gdug pa zhi// ser pos tshe dang bsod nams 'phel// dmar pos 'gro ba bzang mo dbang// nag pos dgra bgegs gsod par byed// ye shes lha rnams bsgrub pa ni// snying po bris la tsha tshwar gzhug/ bskyed bstim mchod bstod bzlas par bya// mchog gi dngos grub ster bar 'gyur// 'jig rten lha rnams sgrub 'dod na// gang bsgrub srog sngags tsha tshar bzhugs// bskyed la spyan drang mchod pa 'bul// lha lnga nges par 'grub 'gyur la// thun mong dngos grub ster ba dang// srog ser gtad sogs 'grub pa'o// ser ba bcad dam ngag mnan nam// phas kyi rbod gtong bzlog pa sogs// las rnams ma lus 'grub pa yin// thams cad kun gyi gzhir 'gyur ro// gang zhig tshe las 'das pa la// rus pa gos sam dri ma la// gur gum la sogs chus bkrus nas// mchod rten nang na yi dam lha// mdun na sgrib pa sbyong ba gnas// oM da ha da ha sarba na ra ka ga te he tu hUM phaT/ oM pa tsa pa tsa sarba pre ta ga te he tu hUM phaT/ oM ma tha ma tha sarba tir ya ka ga te he tu hUM phaT/ de nas sku gdung byin brlabs la// me long ngos la tsan+dan gyis// sngags ni tshar yang bdun bris la// re re la ni brgya rtsa brgyad// bzlas nas bum pa'i nang du blugs// de bzhin bum pa khengs pa'i chu// dkar rtsi sbyar nas mchod rten byug/ yang na 'dag pa'i gseb tu btang// ye d+harmA he tu pra b+ha bA he tun+te ShAn ta thA ga to h+ya ba data/ te ShAny+tsa yo ni ro d+ha e baM bA dI ma hA shra ma NaH rgyu 'bras chos rnams rdzogs pa ru// sngags 'dis byin gyis brlab par bya// oM badzra ku sha mr-i ti ud pa ta sa myeg a rid ti/ i tra pa ya ma bo d+hi ang gar d+ya Ar+ya ba ti u rnam ga pa ri

sur na ru phyi ti ku ru swA hA/ 'bras bu'i chos rnams rdzogs bya'i phyir// mnyam pa'i phyag rgyas 'od 'phros las// chos rnams rdzogs par byin gyis brlabs/ sku dang ye shes gnyis su gsal// oM badzra dz+nyA na pany+tsa kA ya/ g+hu ya gar b+ha ma tra shu tri ni/ ku ru dz+nyA sarba ba ga/ a mo ka la ya swA hA/ zhes gsungs so// sku gdung 'bar ba mchod rten gyi rgyud las/ gsang ba chen po las kyi rim pa sna tshogs pa grub par bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal gsang ba'i bdag po chen pos lus kyi mchod rten 'di gsungs so// he ru ka yi gnas bcu nas// gdug pa thabs kyis bsgral ba'i phyir// dur khrod chen po'i gnas brgyad du// rang byung mchod rten chen po ni// shar phyogs rgya gar yul na ni// ma ga d+ha yi ljongs dag na// dur khrod chen po bsil ba'i tshal/ lum ba'i tshal du sku bltams nas// ba su ki dang sgrogs pa dang// shir sha'i shing dang lha dbang dang// yid bzhin lhun grub bde byed bstan// dus gsum sangs rgyas rab bdun byung// mkhas shing snying stobs che ba'i gnas// gtum drag in+d+ra bo d+hi'i gnas// 'byung po rag sha seng mdog bzhugs// shar lho mtshams ni bal po'i yul// ta na ya ma kha byang kri// lhun grub dur khraud byin za dang// shi bu ka ran tsa ta 'bim pa dang// mchod rten kha shor bya khi kha// ston pa dka' thub mdzad pa de// bal rje na le 'be ba yod// de na zas kyi longs spyod che// bkra shis mchod rten hu lu ka/ 'byung po gu gu ta nags gnas// lho phyogs sing ha'i yul dag na// dur khrod chen po sku la rdzogs// tsu ta'i shing na gshin rje dang// keng rus can te sin+d+hu'i mtsho// ston pa rab tu byung ba'i gnas// mthong thos rdzu 'phrul mang po ldan// pad+ma drag po g.yo ba dang// mchod rten ri bo ta la nyid// 'byung po ser skya ral pa can// lho nub mtshams kyi tho gar yul// dur khrod chen po gsang chen na// rigs ldan dang ni gtum pa dang// shang ni ral twa srin po dang// ston pas bdud rnams btul ba'i gnas// mthu dbang rab tu che ba'i yul// phyag na rdo rjes dbang bskur zhing// rgyal po ku ku rA dza'i gnas// mun pa drag po drag kyang yul// mchod rten mgo mangs bsod nams gter// 'byung po nag po dbang ldan bzhugs// nub kyi phyogs na za hor yul// dur khrod khu byug kong dgu na// shing bu kang kol klu dbang gnas// kar ko ta dang g.yo bstan dang// rgya mtsho rba klong can dag na// rgyal po tshangs pa byin gyi dbang// rdo rje 'bar ba mya ngan 'das// mchod rten bde byed gzhon nu bzhugs// rin chen sna brgyad yod pa'i gnas// 'byung po rdo rje sna yon yod// nub byang mtshams su kha che'i yul// dur khrod chen

po he chen rol// klu bdag dung skyong sprin dbang phyug/ bar ka par ta'i nags tshal na// ston pa khab tu bzhengs pa'i gnas// rgyal po ma skyes dgra yi yul// 'dod pa'i yon tan phun sum tshogs// ki ki ki la sgra yang sgrogs// mchod rten thar legs chen po yin// 'byung chen gcer bu ral pa can// byang gi phyogs na u rgyan yul// dur khrod pad+ma brtsegs pa na// a shwad shing la gnod sbyin dang// 'jog po dang ni cher sgrogs dang// ston pas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor// u rgyan thor cog can gyi yul// bying chu'i rgya mtsho chen po ni// u rgyan rgyal po u pa rA// tshang tshing na ni chos kyi gter// gzi yi mchod rten chos 'khor can// 'byung po'i tsa na dbus na yod// byang shar mtshams na li yi yul// dur khrod 'jig rten mngon rdzogs na// dpal ldan pad+ma chen po dang// mi bzad drag po gang ba dang// mchod rten gau te shan zhes bya// ston pas cho 'phrul bstan pa'i gnas// chu byin me 'bar 'phrul snang mang// li rje btsan po'i rgyal khams yin// de ltar dur khrod chen po brgyad// mchod rten chen po brgyad rnams bzhugs/ sangs rgyas sku yi rten yin te// rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas sku gdung dang// sprul pa sku yi sku gdung dang// nyan thos rang rgyal byang chub sems// mya ngan 'das pa'i sku gdung snod// mchod rten bum par gnas pa yin// sku gdung rnams kyi rgyu bshad na// de rgyu'i snying po byang chub sems// rkyen ni sngags dang phyag rgya dang// ting 'dzin bzang mos 'grub pa de// mdor na bskyed dang rdzogs par snang// stong nyid rab tu 'byongs las byung// 'bras bu rgyu dang 'brel ba ni// byang chub sems rtog ring bsrel byung// gzugs sku 'byongs na yi dam sku// ye shes rtogs na 'ja' tshon 'od// bla ma mnyes na yi ge'i 'bru// mkha' 'gro 'dus na sgra yang sgrogs// sku rnams 'byongs na sku gdung nyid// gsung rnams 'thebs na yi ge sngags// thugs nyid 'byongs na ring bsrel shar// mtshan rtags mthar phyin tshogs rdzogs nas// dung gi gzugs su snang ba yin// mdo bzlas ngag la 'thebs pa ni// me tog gzugs kyang 'byung ba yin// mdor na dge ba'i las brtson na// dge rtags ci yang snang ba yin// sku gsum 'grub pa'i rgyu yin pas// ma 'ongs chos la bsgom bsgrub rnams// brtson pas byas nas 'bad pas 'grub// rang lus mchod rten chen por shar// lto ba rmang gzhi legs pa la// yan lag bzhi po bang rim nyid// mgo ni bum par gnas pa yin// phung po lnga dang 'byung ba lnga// dbang po rnam shes mchod rten lha// lus kyi tshul du sangs rgyas pa'o// rdzogs pa a nu yo ga yi// srog shing gsum gyi mchod rten la// me rlung gnyis kyi rmang

gzhi bting// 'khor lo bzhi yi bang rim la// dbu yi gtsug tor bum par shar/ khams kyi bdud rtsi lha yi bu// dri chen rnam snang byang chub sems// mi bskyod sha chen rin chen 'byung// pad+ma rak+ta snang mtha' yas// dri chu las te 'byung bzhi yum// sngags kyi yi ge ngag tu gnas// 'od kyis 'gro ba'i sgrib pa sbyangs// snying po rlung ni thugs su gnas// 'gro ba ma lus gnas 'dir gnas// 'gro ba ma lus gnas 'dir 'dus// oM AHhUM/ 'jug dang ldan dang gnas pa yis// sku gsum mi zad rgyan 'khor 'grub// oM AHhUM swA hA/ lnga yi bdag nyid bcu ming can// 'di ni rnam shes gzhol ba'i lha// rigs lnga 'khor bcas sangs rgyas pa'o// a nr-i su tri pre du/ 'dod pa'i khams na gnas pa rnams// yi ge drug gis rab tu sbyangs// oM gzugs khams bsam gtan gnas pa kun// sngags kyi mchod rten nyid du nges// gzugs med sangs rgyas a ru sangs rgyas pa/ khams gsum ye nas mchod rten sbyangs// zhes gsungs so// sku gdung 'bar ba mchod rten gyi rgyud las/ rang lus mchod rten du bstan pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis man ngag rdzogs pa'i mchod rten 'di gsungs so// kun gzhi'i rnam shes mchod rten la// nyon mongs yid kyi bang rim bcas// yid kyi rnam shes bus pa la// sgo lnga'i rnam shes 'khor lor gsal// kun gzhi rnam dag chos kyi sku// rang byung ye shes rdzogs pa'i yid// nyon mongs rnam lnga ye shes 'khor// sgo lnga snang ba rol par bshad// 'khor ba nyid ni mya ngan 'das// snang srid gzhi bzhengs chos kyi sku// byas pa med par ngang gis grol// rang byung ye shes mchod rten du// 'khor 'das ma lus rdzogs par gnas// ma byas lhun gyis grub pa'o// sku gdung 'bar ba mchod rten gyi rgyud las/ man ngag rdzogs pa'i mchod rten gyi le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas gsang ba'i bdag po la dge slong li tsa byi dri ma med par grags pas zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma 'ongs pa'i sems can skal ba dman pa rnams kyi don du/ mchod rten gyi smon lam rgya chen po yon gyi bdag po rnams kyis go bar gsung du gsol/ zhes zhus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rtsod dus kyi blau dman pa rnams kyis go bar bya ba 'di gsungs so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad dang/ bcom ldan 'das mi 'khrugs pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'byung ldan dang/ bcom ldan 'das snang ba mtha' yas dang/ bcom ldan 'das don yod grub pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la sogs te/ ston pa chos kyi rgyal po chen po sku [(]16[)]

gsum dang ye shes bzhi mnga' ba/ stobs dang ma 'dres pas brgyan pa thams cad la/ ming 'di zhes bgyi ba lus ngag yid dang bas gus par phyag 'tshal lo// don dam pa'i chos gsung rab mdo sde bcu gnyis dang/ sde snod gsum gyis bsdus pa rgyu dang 'bras bur bcas pa thams cad la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun 'phags pa byams pa dang/ 'jam dpal dang/ spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug dang/ phyag na rdo rje dang/ sa'i snying po dang/ nam mkha'i snying po dang/ sgrib pa rnam par sel ba dang/ kun tu bzang po la sogs te sa bcu rim par bzhugs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun/ 'phags pa shA ri'i bu dang/ 'phags pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu dang/ 'phags pa rab 'byor dang 'od srungs la sogs te/ skyes bu zung bzhi dang/ gang zag ya brgyad kyis bsdus pa thams cad la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// mchod rten dang sku gdung dang ring bsrel la sogs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i slad du/ sems can rnams kyis bsod nams thob par bgyi ba'i slad du/ thugs rje chen pos khyab pa'i byin gyis brlabs te/ bzhugs pa thams cad la yang gus par phyag 'tshal lo// dpal tshangs pa dang/ brgya byin dang/ rgyal po chen po bzhi dang/ phyogs skyong bcu la sogs pa la yang gus par phyag 'tshal lo// dam pa'i chos bsrung zhing lha dang mi'i srid par sbyor ba'i srung ma dam tshig can thams cad la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa thams cad ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la dgongs su gsol/ mchod rten ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gzugs brnyan rgyu dang 'bras bur bstan te/ rgyu'i chos bang rim dang po dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang/ bang rim gnyis pa yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang/ bang rim gsum pa rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang/ bang rim bzhi pa dbang po lnga dang/ bum rten gyis stobs lnga dang/ bum pa byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang/ kha khyer gyis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad dang/ 'bras bu'i chos kyi 'khor lo bcu gsum gyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang/ char khebs kyis thugs rje bstan pa dang srog shing gi shes pa bcu bstan te/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sku'i gzugs can de lta bu bgyi ba'i rgyu ni/ da ltar gyi sa dang 'jim pa 'di dag gser dang dngul dang shel la sogs pa/ rin po che sna tshogs su dmigs te de dag las grub pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la rgya dpag tshad phyed tsam gyi nang na/ sku yi gzugs brnyan tsha tshwa btab pa rnams/ dpal rnam par snang mdzad la sogs

pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' sha stag bzhugs pa'i zhal nas/ gsang sngags dang/ rig sngags dang/ gzungs sngags kyi 'od zer byung ste/ sems can rnams kyi sgrib pa sbyong zhing don mdzad pa de lta bus/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams lag mthil ltar mnyam pa thams cad du gang bar mos shing de bzhin du gyur cig/ de ltar bzhugs pa'i 'phags pa thams cad la ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dang bdag cag la sogs pas/ lus rdul snyed du gyur pa'i lus dang ngag dang yid rab tu dang bar gus pa'i phyags 'tshal lo// dpal kun tu bzang po'i mchod pa'i sprin phung rgyas pa thams cad kyis mchod do// sku dang gsung dang thugs dang phrin las kyi yon tan khyad par can mnga' ba rnams la// sems dang bas dmigs te chags pa med pa'i dbyangs snyan pas bstod do// 'phags pa thams cad ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dang/ bdag cag la sogs pa la dgongs su gsol/ ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dang bdag cag la sogs pas/ chos kyi sku+u dang gzugs kyi sku mthong zhing thob par bgyi ba la/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos ci mchis so 'tshal 'thol zhing bshags so// 'phags pa rnams kyi sku de dag mnyes pa dang/ sku de dag thob par gyur pa'i so so skye bo yan chad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la rjes su yi rang ngo// thugs rje'i dbang gi sprul pa'i sku 'byung ba thams cad chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gsol lo// gang gis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas sems can gyi don mdzad nas/ 'dul ba'i ched du thabs kyis mya ngan las 'das par ston par bzhed pa de dag thams cad mya ngan las mi 'da' bar gsol ba btab bo// ji ltar 'phags pa rnams kyis sems can gyi don du byang chub tu thugs bskyed cing// de dge ba'i rtsa ba bla na med pa'i bsngos pa de ltar/ ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dang bdag cag la sogs pas kyang/ byang chub tu sems bskyed cing/ dge ba'i bla na med par bsngo'o// sku gdung 'bar ba mchod rten gyi rgyud las/ smon lam dge ba bsngo ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas gsang ba'i bdag pos rnying pa spo ba 'di gsungs so// sku gdung rnying pa spo ba ni// sbyor ba dngos gzhi rjes yin no// de la sbyor ba'i bsam pa ni// bgres shing gnas nas 'o brgyal bas// de brten gzhan la sdig sod pas// mos pas bzang por bzhed par bya// dngos gzhi 'di ltar bya ba ste// rnying pa gshegs la gsar ba bzhengs// gshegs pa'i cho ga rab gnas gso// mchod cing mnga' gsol gshegs par zhu// sdig sgrib nyams bshags gshegs su gsol// rten 'brel snying pos 'jig par bya// sa rdo dkor yin ma yar bar// bzhengs pa'i gnas su ma lus

bskyal// de nas gsar pa bzhengs pa ni// dus rings ma lon sngar tshad lhag/ sdig bsags spangs te dge la gnas// bzhengs nas rab gnas ldan par bya// rjes la bkur sti phu dud sogs// mchod rten mchod pa rgyas par bya'o// zhes gsungs pas/ dman pa'i lus kyi sems dpa' rnams// gsang ba'i bdag po la bstod pa/ kye gsang ba'i bdag po khyod// bla med rang bzhin yid gzugs sprul// sngags dang mchod rten kun tshang ba'i// mchod rten 'bar ba'i rgyud gsungs pas// mtha' yas sems can tshogs rnams rdzogs// sangs rgyas nyid du 'di 'gyur ro// zhes bstod do// de nas ston pas gsungs pas/ dam pa'i rigs can dra ma rnams// sku gdung 'bar ba'i rgyud 'di ni// sngo dman rnams kyis go bar bya ba'i phyir/ khyed la man ngag gnyis su gtad// ces gsungs pa la rjes su yi rang ngo// sku gdung 'bar ba'i rgyud las/ rten spo ba dang rjes su yi rang ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//// sku gdung 'bar ba mchod rten gyi rgyud rdzogs so//// klong gsal 'bar ma nyi ma'i gsang rgyud kyi dbu bzhugs/ o rgyan d+hA ki'i skad du/ ma ho b+ha dra shu n+ya tA ti la ka g+hu ya tan+t+ra nA ma/ bsgyur te bod kyi skad du/ kun tu bzang po stong gsal thig le snying po gsang ba'i rgyud ces bya ba/[ ]yang gsang dag pa klong gsal skad du na// ha a oM hUM ki la sa mi khye/ don rgyud rang gsal shar ba'i skad du na// stong gsal mdangs lnga ma skyes mi 'gag pa// ngo bo rang rig ye shes chen po nyid// rtog tshogs rang grol mkha' la nyi shar dang// kun tu bzang mo yangs pa'i klong la phyag 'tshal lo// rgya gar saM skr-i ta yi skad du na/ b+ha dra pha la d+harma a b+hi sUr+ya g+hu ya tan+t+ra/ dgongs te rnam grol bod kyi skad du na/ kun tu bzang mo klong gsal 'bar ma nyi ma'i gsang rgyud/ rang byung rang gsal ngang la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad klong nas shar ba'i dus gcig na/ khyad par phun sum tshogs pa dag pa'i gnas// chos dbyings spros bral pho brang du// ston pa khyad 'phags phun sum tshogs pa ni// cir yang ma grub ye shes rang gsal yum// 'khor ni khyad 'phags phun sum tshogs pa ste// sku dang ye shes stong gsal ma 'gags pa// dus ni khyad 'phags phun sum tshogs pa ste/ rtag pa rgyun gyi thog mtha' med pa'o// bstan pa khyad 'phags phun sum tshogs pa ni// bde ba chen po lhun gyis grub pa'o// thog mtha' bral ba de nyid dus kyi tshe// kun tu bzang mo rigs bzhi'i mkha' 'gro dang// dbyings dang ye shes gdangs las grub pa yi// d+hA ki grangs las 'das pa'i 'khor tshogs dang// sprul pa yang sprul pho nya mgyogs ma'i

tshogs// 'das dang ma 'das 'od lus 'phrul mo che// d+hA ki phrangs las 'das pa thams cad dang// mnyam nyid rol pa chen po'i ngang nyid du// dgongs pa bzhi ldan tshul du rab bzhugs so// de nas stong pa'i ngang las gsal ba'i dbyangs dang bcas// dgu 'gyur khug pa'i gdangs su rang shar ba// tshig brjod rim pa'i gsang rgyud 'di nyid ni// 'khor tshogs rang rang dgongs pa tshig tu gsal// kun tu bzang mo klong gsal nyi ma'i rgyud// sum brgya drug cu bye ba phrag brgya'i skad// tshangs dbyangs nga ro'i skad ky-i yongs grags so// de nas 'khor rnams rjes su yi rang ste// kun tu bzang mo gsang ba'i rang sgra las// mngon par dad ste rab tu dad par bstod// sa ma ya/ rgya rgya rgya/ man tra g+hu ya/ thun mongs ma yin pa'i brjod gzhi las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o/// de nas chos dbyings gsal ba yi// yum mchog kun tu bzang mo la// ston pa kun tu bzang po dang// rigs bzhi'i DA kis 'di skad gsol// kye ma kye klong kye ma ho// 'di lta bu yi gsang rgyud las// dgongs pa dpag par mi nus pas/ rim pa bzhin du gsal du gsol// ma grub thog ma'i ka dag nas// kun khyab ye shes gnas pa las// 'khrul med 'khrul dang gnas pa'i tshul// lam dang 'char sgo yul gang gsal// nyams len gong 'phel grol ba'i rtags// rkyen gyis bar chad ji lta bu/ chos dbyings bzang mos bshad du gsol// de skad ces ni zhus pa'i lan// kun bzang yum gyi gdams ngag la// kye ho 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs nyon// ma grub thog ma'i ka dag nas// dngos po gshis kyi 'dug tshul ni// ngo bo stong pa rang bzhin gsal// thugs rje kun la snang nus pa// byas pa med par rang gsal ba/ de nyid nas ni rang bzhin gnas// stong pa'i ngos nas rtag mtha' bral// gsal ba'i ngos nas chad mtha' bral// gsal stong ngang nas 'dzin cha bral// thog ma'i ka dag gsal stong khyab// sus kyang byas pa med pa nyid// de ni thog ma'i spyi gzhi'o// zhes rang shar ba'o// a hoH'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs nyon// gzhi gnyis la ni rnam pa gnyis// shes bya'i gzhi dang gnas lugs gzhi// shes bya 'dod gzhung bsam las 'das// gnas lugs gzhi la gsum du ston// thog ma'i gnas pa spyi gzhi dang// de bas ma rig 'khrul gzhi dang// de nyid rtog pa'i grol gzhi'o// thog ma la yang gnyis su ston// ye thog dang po'i gnas lugs dang// rang gi rig pa'i gnas lugs gnyis// ye thog gnas lugs gong dang mthun// stong dang gsal ba khyab pa gsum// dbyer med nyag gcig rang byung ngo// kun khyab ye shes 'di ltar gnas// stong gsal ye shes chen po

ni// ye nas rnam pa gsum du gnas// ngo bo ka dag ye shes ni// ma rig rtog pa kun dang bral// rang bzhin lhun grub ye shes ni// stong gsal rang mdangs nyid du gnas// thugs rjes kun khyab ye shes ni// 'gag med snang stong nyid du gnas// chos sku'i ye shes ka dag bsam brjod bral// longs sku'i ye shes 'od lnga ma 'dres gsal// sprul sku'i ye shes sna tshogs zer du shar// lta ba'i ye shes dpyad pa'i yul dang bral// sgom pa'i ye shes dmigs med zang thal lo// spyod pa'i ye shes 'char sgo ma 'gags pa// ma 'gags ye shes chen po nyid// rang gsal phyogs ris 'dzin dang bral// rang byung ye shes rang las byung// de shes ye shes tsam du brjod// ye shes gsum po de dag las// btags pa ming gis bsgribs pa ste// chos dbyings ye shes ngo bos stong// me long ye shes rang bzhin gsal// mnyam nyid ye shes dbye bsal bral// sor rtogs ye shes ma 'dres gsal// bya grub ye shes byas pa med// kun khyab ye shes gnas lugs dang// ye thog gzhi'i gnas lugs gsal bar bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//[]// kye ho 'dusapa 'i 'khor tshogs nyon// ye shes de ltar gnas pa la// 'khrul med 'khrul dang gnas pa'i tshul// legs par bshad kyis gus pas nyon// thog ma nyid ni 'di lta ste// ye med stong pa nam mkha' la// chos sku zhes ni ming du btags// de yi rang bzhin gsal mdangs la// longs sku zhes ni ming du btags// 'od gsal 'khrul pa'i rang gzugs las// sprul sku zhes ni ming du btags// stong gsal mdangs lnga ldan pa las// lhun grub zhes ni ming du btags// stong pa de la ngo bo zer// gsal ba de la rang bzhin zer// 'od snang de la thugs rje zer// ming yang 'khrul pa'i gzhi mar bshad// ye shes rang bzhin gnas pa la// grangs dang ris su bcad pa la/ kha dog rnam dbye byai ba kun// tha snyad tshig phyir 'brangs pa'o// 'khrul pa yin pas don la sgrib// ye shes nyid gsal rig pa 'khrul// ma rig sangs nas ye shes nyid// 'khrul pa dag pa ka dag yin// ka dag zang thal 'gag med la// chos sku'i rig pa ming du btags// gsal mdangs lhun grub kun khyab las// longs sku'i rig pa ming du btags// ma 'gags rang byung shar ba la// sprul sku'i rig par mtshan du gsol// chos sku'i rig pa stong pa yin// longs sku'i rig pa gsal ba yin// sprul sku'i rig pa khyab gsal lo// stong pa'i rig pa gsal ba yin// gsal ba'i rig pa 'od sku yin// 'od sku'i rig pa snang stong yin// gzhi yi rig pa ka dag yin// lam gyi rig pa lhun grub yin// lhun grub rig pa sku dang ye shes yin// sku dang ye shes

rig pa lug rgyud yin// rig pa ye shes gnyis su med// gnyis 'dzin 'khrul pa 'di nyid do// srid pa'i rtsa ba bdag 'dzin yin// dang po ma rig drug las byung// rgyu dang rkyen gnyis tshogs pa'o// rgyu yi rkyen las rnam pa gsum// bdag rtog gzhan rtog der 'dzin gsum// rkyen la de bzhin rnam pa gsum// bdag rkyen gzhan rkyen dmigs pa'i rkyen// rtsa ba ma rig mun pas bsgribs// nam mkha'i ngo bo stong gsal dang// nyi ma'i ngo bo sgrib bral gnyis// ma rig thibs pa'i mun pas bsgribs// de la stong gsal rang mdangs las// 'od khyim tshul du gnas pa de// de las 'dzin byed shes pa ni// rta rnga tsam gcig 'gyus pa ste// byung ni 'od khyim rang las byung// stong grogs ye shes rlung rig byas// don la rig pa'i rtsal yin no// ye shes gsal ba'i yul drug las// gnyis 'dzin sems de byung ba'o// 'od khyim kha dog lnga ldan de// dngos po can du 'dug snyam nas// bdag ni pha gi yin nam snyam// pha gi bdag las byung ngam ci// rtogs byed srid pa gsum du 'gyus// de yang 'khrul pa'i gzhi mar bshad// ngo bo rang bzhin thugs rje gsum// stong gsal 'gag pa med pa las// dngos po mtshan ma can du bzung// rang rig ye shes zang thal la// bdag dang gzhan du 'dzin pa'i sems// ma rig pa yi rgyu yi rkyen// rgyu las a 'thas dmigs pa'i rkyen// yul snang dag las a 'thas pas// ye shes ma rig yul las bzung// der 'dzin rlung sems 'dus pa las// 'byung ba lnga yi sbubs su tshud// ye shes rang rtsal 'byung ba lnga/ kha dog rim pa lnga ru shar// gong gi rtog byed gsum po las// phra rab rdul gyi cha tsam du// rtog dpyod rnam pa mang du shar// 'od khyim kha dog lnga pa la// ming ris dngos po can du bzung// 'od ljang bya grub ye shes las// der 'dzin zhugs pas rlung gi gzhi// byi ba'i kha rlangs tsam du byung// 'od dkar me long ye shes las// der 'dzin zhugs pas cha yi gzhi// dkar po sran 'bru tsam gcig chags// 'od zer mnyam nyid ye shes las// der 'dzin zhugs pas sa yi gzhi// ser po ra ril tsam gcig grub// 'od dmar sor rtogs ye shes las// 'dzin pa zhugs pas me yi gzhi// dmar po mtheb mo tsam gcig byung// mthing ga chos dbyings ye shes ni// gdod ma nyid nas ye shes dang// mnyam du gnas te 'pho 'gyur med// 'byung lnga'i gzhi ma dpe lnga las// rang 'od ye shes lnga ru gsal// yaM raM khaM gsum e ru shar// 'byung ba lnga po de dag ni// gcig gis gcig bskyed byas pa las// mi mjed 'jig rten khams su chags// de yang rgyu rkyen ma rig nyid// ye shes rang mdangs 'od lnga las// der 'dzin zhugs pas 'byung bzhi grub// de yang

'khrul pa'i gzhi mar bshad// lnga la rlung chags rgya gram tshul// rlung la chu chags rgya mtshor 'khyil// chu las sa chags nga la'i tshul// me ni rlung gi rtsal yin pas// 'byung ba gsum las mnyam par khyab// rlung yang kun gyi grogs yin no// [ ]kun tu bzang mo klong gsal nyi ma'i gsang rgyud las ma rig 'khrul pa gtan la dbab pa/ lhun grub kyi sbubs su 'dzin byed kyi shes pa bstan nas/ phyi snod kyi 'ablig rten 'khrul lugs bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//[ ]kye ho 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs nyon// phyi yi snod la brten nas kyang// nang bcud sems can 'di ltar byung// 'byung bzhi 'dus pa'i rang bzhin gyis// 'og gi 'byung ba rlung 'gul bas// rgya gram rlung gi lte ba la// ye shes rang rtsal drod byung bas// steng gi chu 'di sa la phog/ chu la rlangs pa mdung gang byung// des ni sa yi da la chags/ kha gting med par bun ne ba// de las 'byung bzhi mdongs 'od 'bar// ye shes rang 'od shar ba dang// 'od rnams 'dres pa'i 'od skor ni// rba phub tsam pa gsum du byung// gcig ni snang la rang bzhin med// de las 'od gsal lha gnas chags// lha yi 'od zer tshul du ni// gzugs med skye mched mu bzhi byung// de yi rig rtsal cho 'phrul la// gzugs khams gnas rigs bcu bdun byung// gnas rigs de rnams thams cad du// ye shes snang ba gnas gyur kyang// ma rig bdag 'dzin dbang gis na// rigs drug sems can dpag med byung// ma rig 'khrul 'khor 'di la zad med 'phel ba med// de la dug lnga dug gsum byung// de las nyon mongs stong phrag brgyad cu byung// rtsa ba 'dzin byed shes pa bun pa gcig/ de las de skyes 'khrul pa'o// [ ]/ kun tu bzang mo klong gsal nyi ma'i gsang rgyud las/ nang gi bcud kyi sems can 'khrul lugs bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o///// kye ho 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs nyon// 'di ltar steng du 'od skor gnyis la ni// nyi ma dang ni zla ba byung// de yang nam mkha'i bcud yin pas// 'od tshogs tshul du dbyings la shar// de yang ye shes rtsal yin phyir// kun la gsal bar nus pa'o// rlung mdangs yin pas 'gro bar nus// me mdangs yin pas drod dang ldan// nyi ma me yi dwangs ma yin// zla ba chu yi dwangs ma yin// de yi rtsal las gza' skar shar// 'byung gzhi gcig grogs gcig yin no// 'byung bzhi rgyas dus nyi ma ring// 'byung bzhi snyoms dus nyin mtshan mnyam// 'byung bzhi 'khrugs dus nyi ma thung// drod mdangs thams cad nyi ma'o// 'byung bzhi byer dus nyi ma 'chi/ kha char bu yug thams cad kun// drod byung 'byung

ba'i rtsal yin no// dbyar ni 'byung ba rgyas pa'i dus// mdangs las rtsi shing myu gu dang// me tog lo 'bras thams cad smin// ston ni 'byung ba snyoms pa'i dus// 'bras bu thams cad bcud du smin// dgun ni 'byung ba 'khrugs pa ste// rtsi bcud thams cad nyams pa'o// dpyid la 'byung ba byer ba ste// mdangs stobs thams cad nyams pa'o// der yang ma rig rgyu las byung//[ ]kun tu bzang mo klong gsal nyi ma'i gsang rgyud las/ nyi zla 'byung bzhi 'phel 'grib bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o////[ ]kye ho 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs kun// ma yengs dgongs pas legs par nyon// 'khrul lugs rnam pa mang bshad kyang// ye shes lnga yi rtsal nyid yin// rtsal gyis ye shes ngo ma shes// dngos po 'dzin pa can du 'khrul// ye shes lnga las 'byung ba lnga// 'byung ba lnga las skye gnas bzhi// rigs dang sems can dpag med 'byung/ khams gsum 'khor ba'i khang pa ru// rgyud drug sems can re mos 'khor// yid dang gzugs kyi 'dam las chags// rang ngo ma shes rang rgyud 'khrul// 'khrul pa lus kyi grub tshul ni// yang dag pa ni ngas bshad do// lnga 'dus mtshan ma sbyor ba las// nyon mongs lnga dang yid drug dang// ye shes lnga yi bdag nyid do// chos nyid gsal mdangs 'od khyim las// 'od zer tshul du ye shes la/ 'gag pa med pa shar ba de// chos nyid gzhi mdangs yin pas ngo ma shes// der 'dzin dri ma ma rig pas// 'dzin byed shes pa breng pa gcig/ bdag dang gzhan du bzung ba de// bdag dang nyon mongs lnga dang yid drug dang// bsdongs nas shes pa breng ba gcig/ pho mo sbyor ba byed pa la// bde ba gnyis snyoms 'dres pa'i dus// ye shes rang rtsal ma rig pa// gnyis 'dzin sems de mngal du 'thums// pha ma gnyis kyi thig le dang// rgyu rkyen 'di dag rab tu 'dres// mtshal dang zho yi tshul ltar ro// 'byung ba bzhi yi lus su 'ong// zhag ni bdun tshan brgyad dag tu// mer mer nur nur gor gor dang// ltar ltar mkhrang gyur khyab 'jug dang// rus sbal sbal pa lta bu de// rim pa bzhin du lus rgyas so// zhag ni bdun tshan dang po la// 'byung ba chu yis rab bsdus te// mer mer po yi thig le ni// yungs 'bru brgya yi cha tsam chags// 'byung bzhi rlung sems 'dus pa yis// lus po chags pa'i rten sems yin// zhag ni bdun phrag gnyis pa la// 'byung ba sa yi sa rab brten te// yung 'bru bcu yi cha tsam chags// zhag ni bdun phrag gsum pa la// 'byung ba me yis rab smin te// yungs 'bru brgyad cha tsam du chags// zhag ni bdun phrag bzhi pa la// 'byung ba rlung gis rab gtor te// thig le dkar po dngul

chu bzhin// yungs 'bru phyed pa gcig tu chags// zhag ni bdun phrag lnga pa la// 'byung ba chu yis rab bsdus te// yungs 'bru gcig gi tshad du chags// zhag ni bdun phrag drug pa la// me rlung gnyis kyis rab smin te// yungs 'bru gnyis kyi cha tsam chags// zhag ni bdun phrag bdun pa la// 'byung bzhi 'dus nas mer mer po// yungs 'bru gsum gyi cha tsam chags// mig gnyis rab tu 'phra bar 'gyur// zhag ni bdun phrag brgyad pa la// 'byung bzhi rab tu 'khrugs pa yi// chus bshigs sas mnan mes bsdus bsregs// rlung gis gtor zhing med par byas// de nas chu yis rab bsdus te// nur nur sran ma bcu cha chags// shar gyi rtsa ni ri bong rdul// stong du btang ba'i cha tsam chags// zhag ni bdun phrag dgu pa la// 'byung ba sa yis sra bar byas// sran ma dgu yi cha tsam dang// lho yi rtsa ni gong ltar chags// zhag ni bdun phrag bcu pa la// me yis drod bskyed brtan par byas// sran ma/ bdun cha tsam pa dang// nub kyi rtsa yang gong ltar chags// zhag ni bdun phrag bcu gcig la// 'byung ba rlung gis rab gtor nas// sran ma lnga cha tsam gcig chags// byang gi rtsa yang gong ltar bskyed// zhag ni bdun phrag bcu gnyis la// lus ni sran ma rdog po tsam// nur nur po dang sa thag ltar/ khyad par mig gnyis gsal bar chags// zhag ni bdun phrag bcu gsum la// 'byung bzhi 'khrugs te slar bshig go/ zhag ni bdun phrag bcu bzhi la// rab tu 'dus te mthe bong tsam// rtsa yang shin tu rags pa bskyed// zhag ni bdun phrag bco lnga la// rlung gis phye zhing chu yis bsdus// sa yis bzung zhing me yis smin// lte ba sprul pa'i 'khor lo la// rtsa 'dab drug cu rtsa bzhi chags// rlung sems 'dus pa'i spyan gnyis chags// zhag ni bdun phrag bcu drug la// snying ga chos kyi 'khor lo ste// rtsa 'dab sum bcu rtsa gnyis chags// zhag ni bdun phrag bcu bdun la// mgrin pa longs spyod 'khor lor chags// rtsa 'dab bcu drug spyan gnyis chag/ zhag ni bdun phrag bco brgyad la// spyi bo bde chen 'khor lor ni// rtsa 'dab sum brgya drug cu dang// rlung sems 'dus pa'i spyan gnyis chags// zhag ni bdun phrag bcu dgu la// rlung gis bskyed nas so sor che// chu yis bsdus shing sa yis bzung// me yis smin cing mkhrang bar byas// dbus su rtsa gsum ka ba dang// 'khor lo bzhi la dril te chags// zhag ni bdun phrag nyi shu la// 'byung bzhi'i las kyis mkhrang gyur zhig khyab 'jug nya ltar gyur pa'o// zhag ni bdun phrag nyer gcig la// sas bzung mes smin dbang po dod// zhag ni bdun phrag nyer gnyis la// chus bskyed pas su lus grub ste// rus sbal lta bur khyud

gang gyur// zhag ni bdun phrag nyer gsum la// me yis smin cing yan lag skye// zhag ni bdun tshad nyer bzhi la// rlung gis bskyed nas dbu mar tshud// de dus lus kyi 'byung ba snyams// ye shes dag kyang bskyed pa'o// zhag ni bdun phrag nyer lnga la// chu yis smin cing sa yis then// sha dang khrag kyang grub pa'o// lus ni sbal pa lta bu ste/ mtho gang tshad du bskyed pa'o// zhag ni bdun phrag nyer drug la// me yis mig dang shes pa gsal// rlung gis yan lag don snying thams cad dang// rnam shes phung po khams dang skye mched gsal// zhag ni bdun phrag nyer bdun la// zas kyi dwangs ma bcud dril bas// lpags pa ba spu skra rnams bskyed// nyon mongs rlung gis 'phrig 'gul byed// phal cher zla gsum nyer gcig na// 'phrig 'gul byed par bshad pa'o// sa dang chu dang me dang gsum// rlung gis phye shing lus smin no// de nas bdun tshan dgu la ni// rlung gis phul nas phyir 'byon te// gzhug nas thon te sprul pa'i sku// thog mar rig rtsal ye shes lnga// ma rig 'khrul pas byung ba ste// 'byung ba lnga las byung ba'o// des na lus 'di sprul sku dngos// ye shes chen po'i 'byung gnas nyid// lus can kun la bzang ngan med// bde gshegs ngo bo 'gro kun la// til la mar gyis khyab bzhin gnas// ma rig grol tshe 'byung ba'i lus// lhag med ye shes ngang du zlog/ lus 'di sku gsum nyid yin no// rtsa khams thams cad lha yi sku// lte ba dag nas rim bzhin nyid// gzung 'dzin srid pa'i sbyor mtshams su// lte ba gru gsum rtsa ru chags// rlung sems thig le rnam par 'phro// mig gi rnam pa lta bu ru// mer nur gor dang rus sbal ltar// lte ba dag nas 'byung bzhi bskyed// rim gnyis bskyed nas sprul sku'i tshul// zla dgu ngo bcu zhag gi grangs// nyis brgya bdun cu dag la 'byon// bdun tshan sum cu rtsa dgu la// lus rdzogs rlung gis phul ba'o/[ ]/ kun tu bzang mo klong gsal nyi ma'i gsang rgyud las/ 'khrul pa lus kyi grub tshul bstan pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o////[ ]kye ho 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs kun// legs par bshad kyi yid la zung zhig nyon// gnas lugs spyi yi gzhi ma las// rnam pa gnyis su ngas bshad do// thog ma'i spyi gzhi gong du bstan// rang rig gnas lugs 'di ltar ro// rig pa ye shes khyab gdal che// 'khor 'das kun gyi srog yin no/ khyad par lus dang sems la khyab// rig pa nyid ni 'di ltar ro// ngo bo rang bzhin thugs rje gsum dang ldan// sems can kun la khyab par gnas// lus can thams cad rig pa'i rtsal// mngal zhugs byang chub lnga ldan te// zla ba dgu ni thig le ste// zla ba bcu ni sa bcu'i tshul// skye gnas rang bzhin

sprul pa'i sku// lhun grub sku gsum bdag nyid do// rang byung ye shes 'byung ba'i mdangs// ye shes rang lus ye shes la// da lta 'khrul kyang ye shes rtsal// rang ngo shes na ye shes nyid// sems can rang rgyud rtog tshogs ni// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis sangs rgyas te// phung po 'byung ba yab yum lnga// gdug lnga ser sna thub pa drug/ tshogs brgyad sems dpa' yab yum brgyad// sgo bzhi sgo ba yab yum bzhi// g.yas g.yon nyi ma zla ba gnyis// rang byung rig pa'i rang rtsal las// sku lnga dang ni ye shes lnga// rig pa 'od lnga rlung gi lnga// shes rab lnga la sogs pa gnas// rig pa ye shes sku lnga
